1937877Di2015UniqueSeparator// we need to cache the keys to update since we can'tDi2015NewLine// modify the collection during enumerationDi2015NewLinevar keysToUpdate = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var entry in dict)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (entry.Key < MinKeyValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        keysToUpdate.Add(entry.Key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (int keyToUpdate in keysToUpdate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SortedDictionary<string, List<string>> value = dict[keyToUpdate];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int newKey = keyToUpdate + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // increment the key until arriving at one that doesn't already existDi2015NewLine    while (dict.ContainsKey(newKey))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        newKey++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dict.Remove(keyToUpdate);Di2015NewLine    dict.Add(newKey, value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1938161Di2015UniqueSeparator[XmlRoot("notes")]Di2015NewLinepublic class NoteList : List<Note>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Set this to 'default' or 'preserve'.Di2015NewLine      serializer.Serialize(fs, noteList);Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(tmpPath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 1943049Di2015UniqueSeparatortype Runner = int -> ResultDi2015NewLineand Result = Result of int * option<Runner>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet AddOne = fun x -> Result(x+1, None)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet Idle = fun x -> Result(x, None)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec Pair(r1,r2) = fun x ->Di2015NewLine    match r1 x withDi2015NewLine    | Result(data,None) -> Result(data, Some(r2))Di2015NewLine    | Result(data,Some(next)) -> Result(data,Some(Pair(next,r2)))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec Repeat r n = fun x ->Di2015NewLine    if n = 0 then r x elseDi2015NewLine    match r x withDi2015NewLine    | Result(data,None) -> Result(data, Some(Repeat r (n-1)))Di2015NewLine    | Result(data,Some(next)) -> Result(data, Some(Pair(next, Repeat r (n-1))))Di2015NewLine
1943049Di2015UniqueSeparatortype Runner = Runner of (int -> int * option<Runner>)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet AddOne = Runner(fun x -> x+1, None)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet Idle = Runner(fun x -> x, None)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec Pair(Runner(r1),R2) = Runner(fun x ->Di2015NewLine    match r1 x withDi2015NewLine    | data,None -> data, Some(R2)Di2015NewLine    | data,Some(next) -> data, Some(Pair(next,R2)))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec Repeat (Runner(r) as R) n = Runner(fun x ->Di2015NewLine    if n = 0 then r x elseDi2015NewLine    match r x withDi2015NewLine    | data,None -> data, Some(Repeat R (n-1))Di2015NewLine    | data,Some(next) -> data, Some(Pair(next, Repeat R (n-1))))Di2015NewLine
1943049Di2015UniqueSeparatortype Runner = Runner of (int -> int * list<Runner>)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet AddOne = Runner(fun x -> x+1, [])Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet Idle = Runner(fun x -> x, [])Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec Pair(Runner(r1),R2) = Runner(fun x ->Di2015NewLine    match r1 x withDi2015NewLine    | data,xs -> data, xs @ [R2]) // inefficientDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec Repeat (Runner(r) as R) n = Runner(fun x ->Di2015NewLine    if n = 0 then r x elseDi2015NewLine    match r x withDi2015NewLine    | data,xs -> data, xs @ List.init (n-1) (fun _ -> R)) // inefficientDi2015NewLine

1951142Di2015UniqueSeparator// Sets list[destination[i]] = list[i] for all i.  Clobbers destination list.Di2015NewLinevoid ReorderByDestination(List<T> list, List<int> destination) {Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine    while (destination[i] != i) {Di2015NewLine      int d = destination[i];Di2015NewLine      T t = list[d];            // save element in destination slotDi2015NewLine      int t_d = destination[d]; // and its own destinationDi2015NewLine      list[d] = list[i];        // move element to destinationDi2015NewLine      destination[d] = d;       // and mark it as movedDi2015NewLine      list[i] = t;              // store saved element in slot iDi2015NewLine      destination[i] = t_d;     // ... and its destinationDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1951526Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// 1 -> A<br/>Di2015NewLine/// 2 -> B<br/>Di2015NewLine/// 3 -> C<br/>Di2015NewLine/// ...Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="column"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string ExcelColumnFromNumber(int column)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string columnString = "";Di2015NewLine    decimal columnNumber = column;Di2015NewLine    while (columnNumber > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \decimal currentLetterNumber = (columnNumber - 1) % 26;Di2015NewLine    \char currentLetter = (char)(currentLetterNumber + 65);Di2015NewLine    \columnString = currentLetter + columnString;Di2015NewLine    \columnNumber = (columnNumber - (currentLetterNumber + 1)) / 26;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return columnString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A -> 1<br/>Di2015NewLine/// B -> 2<br/>Di2015NewLine/// C -> 3<br/>Di2015NewLine/// ...Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="column"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int NumberFromExcelColumn(string column)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int retVal = 0;Di2015NewLine    string col = column.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    for (int iChar = col.Length - 1; iChar >= 0; iChar--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \char colPiece = col[iChar];Di2015NewLine    \int colNum = colPiece - 64;Di2015NewLine    \retVal = retVal + colNum * (int)Math.Pow(26, col.Length - (iChar + 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return retVal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1954031Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MemberDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private static string GetMemberName(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    switch (expression.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      case ExpressionType.MemberAccess: var memberExpression = (MemberExpression)expression; var supername = GetMemberName(memberExpression.Expression); if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(supername)) return memberExpression.Member.Name; return String.Concat(supername, '.', memberExpression.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine      case ExpressionType.Call: var callExpression = (MethodCallExpression)expression; return callExpression.Method.Name;Di2015NewLine      case ExpressionType.Convert: var unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression)expression; return GetMemberName(unaryExpression.Operand);Di2015NewLine      case ExpressionType.Parameter: return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine      default: throw new ArgumentException("The expression is not a member access or method call expression");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public static string Name<T,V>(Expression<Func<T, V>> expression)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return GetMemberName(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public static string Name<T>(Expression<Action<T>> expression)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return GetMemberName(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Copy<D, S, V>(D dest, S source, Expression<Func<S, V>> getVal, Action<D, V> setVal, IDictionary validationDictionary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Func<S, V> doGetVal = getVal.Compile();Di2015NewLine  try { setVal(dest, (V)doGetVal(source)); }Di2015NewLine  catch (System.Exception exception)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    validationDictionary.Add(Member.Name<S,V>(getVal), exception.Message);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestAsset { public string AssetTag { get; set; } public string LocationIdentifier { get; set; } }Di2015NewLineTestAsset Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Dictionary<string, string> validationDictionary = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine  var result = new TestAsset{ AssetTag = "a", LocationIdentifier = "b" };Di2015NewLine  var asset = new TestAsset{ AssetTag = "A", LocationIdentifier = "B" };Di2015NewLine  var validationCount = validationDictionary.Count(); Di2015NewLine  Copy(result, asset, x => asset.AssetTag, (x, v) => x.AssetTag = v, validationDictionary); Di2015NewLine  Copy(result, asset, x => asset.LocationIdentifier, (x, v) => x.LocationIdentifier = v, validationDictionary); Di2015NewLine  if (validationCount < validationDictionary.Count) throw new ArgumentException("Failed validation"); Di2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1955635Di2015UniqueSeparator    Regex regex = new Regex(@"^.*(?<Backup>_\\w_Drive(?<ImageNumber>\\d+)(?<Increment>_i(?<IncrementNumber>\\d+))?)\\.[^.]+$");Di2015NewLine    var results = from file in fileListDi2015NewLine                  let match = regex.Match(file.Name)Di2015NewLine                  let IsMainBackup = !match.Groups["Increment"].SuccessDi2015NewLine                  let ImageNumber = match.Groups["ImageNumber"].ValueDi2015NewLine                  let IncrementNumber = match.Groups["IncrementNumber"].ValueDi2015NewLine                  where match.Groups["Backup"].SuccessDi2015NewLine                  orderby file.CreationTimeDi2015NewLine                  select new { file.Name, file.CreationTime, file.Length,Di2015NewLine                               IsMainBackup, ImageNumber, IncrementNumber };Di2015NewLine
1955635Di2015UniqueSeparator^                   Start of string.Di2015NewLine.*                  Allow anything at the start.Di2015NewLine(?<Backup>...)      Match a backup description (explained below).Di2015NewLine\\.                  Match a literal period.Di2015NewLine[^.]+$              Match the extension (anything except periods).Di2015NewLine$                   End of string.Di2015NewLine
1955635Di2015UniqueSeparator_\\w_Drive           A literal underscore, any letter, another underscore, then the string "Drive".Di2015NewLine(?<ImageNumber>\\d+) At least one digit, saved as ImageNumber.Di2015NewLine(?<Increment>...)?  An optional increment description.Di2015NewLine
1955635Di2015UniqueSeparator_i                      A literal underscore, then the letter i.Di2015NewLine(?<IncrementNumber>\\d+) At least one digit, saved as IncrementNumber.Di2015NewLine

1963758Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void createCsvFile(IDataReader reader, StreamWriter writer) {Di2015NewLine    string Delimiter = "\\"";Di2015NewLine    string Separator = ",";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // write header rowDi2015NewLine    for (int columnCounter = 0; columnCounter < reader.FieldCount; columnCounter++) {Di2015NewLine    \if (columnCounter > 0) {Di2015NewLine    \\writer.Write(Separator);Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \writer.Write(Delimiter + reader.GetName(columnCounter) + Delimiter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    writer.WriteLine(string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // data loopDi2015NewLine    while (reader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine    \// column loopDi2015NewLine    \for (int columnCounter = 0; columnCounter < reader.FieldCount; columnCounter++) {Di2015NewLine    \\if (columnCounter > 0) {Di2015NewLine    \\\writer.Write(Separator);Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\writer.Write(Delimiter + reader.GetValue(columnCounter).ToString().Replace('"', '\\'') + Delimiter);Di2015NewLine    \}   // end of column loopDi2015NewLine    \writer.WriteLine(string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }   // data loopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1966392Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static string escapeBraces(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s.Replace("{", "{{").Replace("}", "}}");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string createFormatString(string template, params string[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        template = escapeBraces(template);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i =0; i < parameters.Length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine            template = template.Replace(Di2015NewLine                escapeBraces(parameters[i]),Di2015NewLine                "{" + i + "}");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return template;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string template = @"<a {}href=""http://www.domain.com"" target=""_blank"">title</a>";Di2015NewLine        string formatString = createFormatString(template, "www.domain.com", "title");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] domains = File.ReadAllLines("domain.txt");Di2015NewLine        string[] titles = File.ReadAllLines("title.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int n = domains.Length;Di2015NewLine        if (titles.Length != n)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidDataException("There must be the same number domains and titles.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] results = new string[n];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            results[i] = string.Format(formatString, domains[i], titles[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        File.WriteAllLines("file1.txt", results.Take(n / 2).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        File.WriteAllLines("file2.txt", results.Skip(n / 2).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1968660Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// 1 -> A<br/>Di2015NewLine/// 2 -> B<br/>Di2015NewLine/// 3 -> C<br/>Di2015NewLine/// ...Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="column"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string ExcelColumnFromNumber(int column)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string columnString = "";Di2015NewLine    decimal columnNumber = column;Di2015NewLine    while (columnNumber > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        decimal currentLetterNumber = (columnNumber - 1) % 26;Di2015NewLine        char currentLetter = (char)(currentLetterNumber + 65);Di2015NewLine        columnString = currentLetter + columnString;Di2015NewLine        columnNumber = (columnNumber - (currentLetterNumber + 1)) / 26;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return columnString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A -> 1<br/>Di2015NewLine/// B -> 2<br/>Di2015NewLine/// C -> 3<br/>Di2015NewLine/// ...Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="column"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int NumberFromExcelColumn(string column)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int retVal = 0;Di2015NewLine    string col = column.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    for (int iChar = col.Length - 1; iChar >= 0; iChar--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char colPiece = col[iChar];Di2015NewLine        int colNum = colPiece - 64;Di2015NewLine        retVal = retVal + colNum * (int)Math.Pow(26, col.Length - (iChar + 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return retVal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1974084Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DirectoryCopyExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DirectoryCopy(".", @".\\temp", true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DirectoryCopy(Di2015NewLine        string sourceDirName, string destDirName, bool copySubDirs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(sourceDirName);Di2015NewLine      DirectoryInfo[] dirs = dir.GetDirectories();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // If the source directory does not exist, throw an exception.Di2015NewLine        if (!dir.Exists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new DirectoryNotFoundException(Di2015NewLine                "Source directory does not exist or could not be found: "Di2015NewLine                + sourceDirName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the destination directory does not exist, create it.Di2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists(destDirName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Directory.CreateDirectory(destDirName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the file contents of the directory to copy.Di2015NewLine        FileInfo[] files = dir.GetFiles();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (FileInfo file in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create the path to the new copy of the file.Di2015NewLine            string temppath = Path.Combine(destDirName, file.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy the file.Di2015NewLine            file.CopyTo(temppath, false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If copySubDirs is true, copy the subdirectories.Di2015NewLine        if (copySubDirs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DirectoryInfo subdir in dirs)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create the subdirectory.Di2015NewLine                string temppath = Path.Combine(destDirName, subdir.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Copy the subdirectories.Di2015NewLine                DirectoryCopy(subdir.FullName, temppath, copySubDirs);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

index < allLines.Length; index++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // split up the data line into its parts, using "|" as separatorDi2015NewLine            // items[0] = dateDi2015NewLine            // items[1] = timeDi2015NewLine            // items[2] = textDi2015NewLine            string[] items = allLines[index].Split(new char[] { '|' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters["@Date"].Value = items[0];Di2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters["@Time"].Value = items[1];Di2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters["@Text"].Value = items[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         con.Close();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1977726Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NumericTextBox : TextBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NumericTextBox()Di2015NewLine        : }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void NumericTextBox_TextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int selectionStart = base.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine        bool changed = false;Di2015NewLine        List<char> charList = new List<char>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < base.Text.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsValidChar(base.Text[i], i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                charList.Add(base.Text[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (changed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string text = new string(charList.ToArray());Di2015NewLine newValue))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Text = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            this.SelectionStart = this.Text.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine        return ((c == '-' && index == 0) || c == '0' || c == '1' || c == '2' || c == '3' || c == '4' || c == '5' || c == '6' || c == '7' || c == '8' || c == '9');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void HandleKeyEvent(KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        if ((Keyboard.Modifiers & ModifierKeys.Control) || e.Key == Key.NumPad5 || e.Key == Key.NumPad6 ||Di2015NewLine            e.Key == Key.NumPad7 || e.Key == Key.NumPad8 || e.Key == Key.NumPad9)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.Handled 1978102Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ShowProgressFormWhileBackgroundWorkerRuns() {Di2015NewLine    // this is your presumably long-running methodDi2015NewLine    Action<string, string> exec = DoSomethingLongAndNotReturnAnyNotification;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ProgressForm p = new ProgressForm(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BackgroundWorker b = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set the worker to call your long-running methodDi2015NewLine    b.DoWork += (object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e) => {Di2015NewLine        exec.Invoke(path, parameters);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set the worker to close your progress form when it's completedDi2015NewLine    b.RunWorkerCompleted += (object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e) => {Di2015NewLine        if (p != null && p.Visible) p.Close();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now actually show the formDi2015NewLine    p.Show();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this only tells your BackgroundWorker to START working;Di2015NewLine    // the current (i.e., GUI) thread will immediately continue,Di2015NewLine    // which means your progress bar will update, the windowDi2015NewLine    // will continue firing button click events and all thatDi2015NewLine    // good stuffDi2015NewLine    b.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1985945Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] parameters = { "ABC", "DEF", "GHI" };Di2015NewLine        string camlQuery = CreateCAMLQuery(parameters);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(camlQuery);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Press any key...");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string CreateCAMLQuery(string[] parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (parameters.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // perhaps set a default query?Di2015NewLine        AppendEQ(sb, "all");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "AND" each parameter to the queryDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppendEQ(sb, parameters[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Insert(0, "<And>");Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("</And>");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Insert(0, "<Where>");Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("</Where>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void AppendEQ(StringBuilder sb, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // put your field's internal name in place of CategoryDi2015NewLine    sb.Append("<Eq>");Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("<FieldRef Name='Category'/>");Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendFormat("<Value Type='Choice'>{0}</Value>", value);Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("</Eq>");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1987199Di2015UniqueSeparator// Pixelize in x axis (choose a whole k s.t. 1 <= k <= Width)Di2015NewLinevar sum = Pixel[0, 0];Di2015NewLinefor (y = 0; y < Height; y++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (x = 0; x < Width + 1; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x % k == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sum /= k;Di2015NewLine            for (xl = Max(0, x-k); xl < x; xl++)Di2015NewLine                Pixel[y, xl] = sum;Di2015NewLine            sum = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (x == Width)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        sum += Pixel[y, x];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now do the same in the y axisDi2015NewLine// (make sure to keep y the outer loop - for better performance)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If your image has more than one channel, then then Pixel should be a struct.Di2015NewLine

1988241Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport reDi2015NewLinedef find_segments(input_string):Di2015NewLine  results = []Di2015NewLine  regex = re.compile(r"\\[([^],]+),([SD]),(\\d)\\]")Di2015NewLine  start = 0Di2015NewLine  while True:Di2015NewLine    m = regex.match(input_string, start)Di2015NewLine    if not m: # no matchDi2015NewLine      return None # whole string didn't match, do another action as appropriateDi2015NewLine    results.append(m.group(1, 2, 3))Di2015NewLine    start = m.end(0)Di2015NewLine    if start == len(input_string):Di2015NewLine      breakDi2015NewLine  return resultsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprint find_segments("[A-Z,S,3][klm,D,4][0-9,S,1]")Di2015NewLine# output:Di2015NewLine#[('A-Z', 'S', '3'), ('klm', 'D', '4'), ('0-9', 'S', '1')]Di2015NewLine

1990954Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] raw;Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // serialize allDi2015NewLine        List<string> data = new List<string> {Di2015NewLine           "abc", "def", "ghi", "jkl", "mno", "pqr" };Di2015NewLine        foreach (string s in data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(s);Di2015NewLine            byte[] lenBuffer = BitConverter.GetBytes(buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(lenBuffer, 0, lenBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        raw = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(raw))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int offset = 3, len;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[128];Di2015NewLine        while (offset-- > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Read(ms, ref buffer, 4);Di2015NewLine            len = BitConverter.ToInt32(buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine            ms.Seek(len, SeekOrigin.Current); // assume seekable, butDi2015NewLine                                              // easy to read past if notDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Read(ms, ref buffer, 4);Di2015NewLine        len = BitConverter.ToInt32(buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine        Read(ms, ref buffer, len);Di2015NewLine        string s = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(buffer, 0, len);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Read(Stream stream, ref byte[] buffer, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (buffer.Length < count) buffer = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine    int offset = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytes = stream.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine        if (bytes <= 0) throw new EndOfStreamException();Di2015NewLine        offset += bytes;Di2015NewLine        count -= bytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1998389Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct tcp_keepaliveDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int OnOff;Di2015NewLine    public int KeepAliveTime;Di2015NewLine    public int KeepAliveInterval;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe byte[] BufferDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buf = new byte[sizeof(tcp_keepalive)];Di2015NewLine            fixed(void* p = &this) Marshal.Copy(new IntPtr(p), buf, 0, buf.Length);Di2015NewLine            return buf;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void KeepAliveTest()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(var c = new TcpClient())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c.Connect("www.google.com", 80);Di2015NewLine        var s = c.Client;Di2015NewLine        var ka = new tcp_keepalive();Di2015NewLine        ka.OnOff = 1; 2001462Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Image FixedSize(Image imgPhoto, int Width, int Height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int sourceWidth = imgPhoto.Width;Di2015NewLine        int sourceHeight = imgPhoto.Height;Di2015NewLine        int sourceX = 0;Di2015NewLine        int sourceY = 0;Di2015NewLine        int destX = 0;Di2015NewLine        int destY = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float nPercent = 0;Di2015NewLine        float nPercentW = 0;Di2015NewLine        float nPercentH = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        nPercentW = ((float)Width / (float)sourceWidth);Di2015NewLine        nPercentH = ((float)Height / (float)sourceHeight);Di2015NewLine        if (nPercentH < nPercentW)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            nPercent = nPercentH;Di2015NewLine            destX =   imgPhoto.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Graphics grPhoto = Graphics.FromImage(bmPhoto);Di2015NewLine        grPhoto.Clear(Color.Red);Di2015NewLine        grPhoto.InterpolationMode =Di2015NewLine                InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        grPhoto.DrawImage(imgPhoto,Di2015NewLine            new Rectangle(destX, destY, destWidth, destHeight),Di2015NewLine            new Rectangle(sourceX, sourceY, sourceWidth, sourceHeight),Di2015NewLine            GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 2006406Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum OracleVersionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Oracle9,Di2015NewLine    Oracle10,Di2015NewLine    Oracle0Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate OracleVersion GetOracleVersion()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey rgkLM = Registry.LocalMachine;Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey rgkAllHome = rgkLM.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\ORACLE\\ALL_HOMES");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Di2015NewLine     * 10g Installationen don't have an ALL_HOMES keyDi2015NewLine     * Try to find HOME at SOFTWARE\\ORACLE\\Di2015NewLine     * 10g homes start with KEY_Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    string[] okeys = rgkLM.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\ORACLE").GetSubKeyNames();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string okey in okeys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (okey.StartsWith("KEY_"))Di2015NewLine            return OracleVersion.Oracle10;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (rgkAllHome != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string strLastHome = "";Di2015NewLine        object objLastHome = rgkAllHome.GetValue("LAST_HOME");Di2015NewLine        strLastHome = objLastHome.ToString();Di2015NewLine        RegistryKey rgkActualHome = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\ORACLE\\HOME" + strLastHome);Di2015NewLine        string strOraHome = OracleVersion.Oracle9;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return OracleVersion.Oracle0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GetOracleHome()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey rgkLM = Registry.LocalMachine;Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey rgkAllHome = rgkLM.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\ORACLE\\ALL_HOMES");Di2015NewLine    OracleVersion ov = this.GetOracleVersion();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch(ov)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case OracleVersion.Oracle10:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] okeys (okey.StartsWith("KEY_"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return rgkLM.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\ORACLE\\" + okey).GetValue("ORACLE_HOME") as string;Di2015NewLine OracleVersion.Oracle9:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string strLastHome = "";Di2015NewLine                object objLastHome = rgkAllHome.GetValue("LAST_HOME");Di2015NewLine 2007631Di2015UniqueSeparator#
2007631Di2015UniqueSeparator\\"             # We're looking for a string delimited by quotation marksDi2015NewLine(              # Capture the contents of the quotation marksDi2015NewLine  (?:          #   Start a non-capturing groupDi2015NewLine    [^\\\\"]     #     Either read a character that isn't a quote or a slashDi2015NewLine    |(?:\\\\\\")  #     Or read in a slash followed by a quote.Di2015NewLine  )*           #   Keep readingDi2015NewLine)              # End the capturing groupDi2015NewLine\\"             # The string literal ends in a quotation markDi2015NewLine\\.Localize\\(\\) # and ends with the literal '.Localize()', escaping ., ( and )Di2015NewLine
2007631Di2015UniqueSeparator\\"((?:[^\\\\\\\\\\"]|(?:\\\\\\\\\\"))*)\\"\\\\.Localize\\\\(\\\\)Di2015NewLine

2009473Di2015UniqueSeparator    public interface IRuntimeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool Run(RuntimesetupInfo setupInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The runtime class derives from MarshalByRefObject, so that a proxy can be returnedDi2015NewLine    // across an AppDomain boundary.Di2015NewLine    public class Runtime : MarshalByRefObject, IRuntimeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public bool Run(RuntimeSetupInfo setupInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // your code hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Sample code follows here to create the appdomain, set startup paramsDi2015NewLine    // for the appdomain, create an object in it, and execute a methodDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Construct and initialize settings for a second AppDomain.Di2015NewLine        AppDomainSetup domainSetup = new AppDomainSetup()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ApplicationBase = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetupInformation.ApplicationBase,Di2015NewLine            ConfigurationFile = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetupInformation.ConfigurationFile,Di2015NewLine            ApplicationName = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetupInformation.ApplicationName,Di2015NewLine            LoaderOptimization = LoaderOptimization.MultiDomainHostDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the child AppDomain used for the service tool at runtime.Di2015NewLine        childDomain = AppDomain.CreateDomain(Di2015NewLine            "Your Child AppDomain", null, domainSetup);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create an instance of the runtime in the second AppDomain. Di2015NewLine        // A proxy to the object is returned.Di2015NewLine        IRuntime runtime = (IRuntime)childDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap(Di2015NewLine            typeof(Runtime).Assembly.FullName, typeof(Runtime).FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // start the runtime.  call will marshal into the child runtime appdomainDi2015NewLine        return runtime.Run(setupInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // runtime has exited, finish off by unloading the runtime appdomainDi2015NewLine        if(childDomain != null) AppDomain.Unload(childDomain);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2010404Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int getBitCount(int bits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bits = bits - ((bits >> 1) & 0x55555555);Di2015NewLine        bits = (bits & 0x33333333) + ((bits >> 2) & 0x33333333);Di2015NewLine        return ((bits + (bits >> 4) & 0xF0F0F0F) * 0x1010101) >> 24;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int flipRandomBit(int data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = random.Next(getBitCount(data));Di2015NewLine        int mask = data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < index; i++)Di2015NewLine            mask &= mask - 1;Di2015NewLine        mask ^= mask & (mask - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return data ^ mask;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2010498Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class GeoCodeCalcDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public const double EarthRadiusInMiles = 3956.0;Di2015NewLine    public const double EarthRadiusInKilometers = 6367.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double ToRadian(double val) { return val * (Math.PI / 180); }Di2015NewLine    public static double DiffRadian(double val1, double val2) { return ToRadian(val2) - ToRadian(val1); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double CalcDistance(double lat1, double lng1, double lat2, double lng2) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CalcDistance(lat1, lng1, lat2, lng2, GeoCodeCalcMeasurement.Miles);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double CalcDistance(double lat1, double lng1, double lat2, double lng2, GeoCodeCalcMeasurement m) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double radius = GeoCodeCalc.EarthRadiusInMiles;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m == GeoCodeCalcMeasurement.Kilometers) { radius = GeoCodeCalc.EarthRadiusInKilometers; }Di2015NewLine        return radius * 2 * Math.Asin( Math.Min(1, Math.Sqrt( ( Math.Pow(Math.Sin((DiffRadian(lat1, lat2)) / 2.0), 2.0) + Math.Cos(ToRadian(lat1)) * Math.Cos(ToRadian(lat2)) * Math.Pow(Math.Sin((DiffRadian(lng1, lng2)) / 2.0), 2.0) ) ) ) );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum GeoCodeCalcMeasurement : intDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Miles = 0,Di2015NewLine    Kilometers = 1Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2010810Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueryExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TEntity> LikeAny<TEntity>(Di2015NewLine        this IQueryable<TEntity> query,Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TEntity, string>> selector,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<string> values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (selector == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("selector");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (values == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("values");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!values.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return query;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var p = selector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine        var conditions = values.Select(v =>Di2015NewLine            (Expression)Expression.Call(typeof(SqlMethods), "Like", null,Di2015NewLine                selector.Body, Expression.Constant("%" + v + "%")));Di2015NewLine        var body = conditions.Aggregate((acc, c) => Expression.Or(acc, c));Di2015NewLine        return query.Where(Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(body, p));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2012298Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> SelectRecursive<T>(this IEnumerable<T> subjects,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (subjects == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Queue<T> stillToProcess = new Queue<T>(subjects);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (stillToProcess.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T item = stillToProcess.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine        foreach (T child in selector(item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stillToProcess.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2012446Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar foo = GetYourObjectFromSomewhere();Di2015NewLinestring bar = ExprToString(() => foo.Property);    // bar = "foo.Property"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string ExprToString<T>(Expression<Func<T>> e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // use a stack and a loop so that we can cope with nested propertiesDi2015NewLine    // for example, "() => foo.First.Second.Third.Fourth.Property" etcDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stack<string> stack = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemberExpression me = e.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    while (me != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(me.Member.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        me = me.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return string.Join(".", stack.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2013397Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var list = new[]Di2015NewLine                       {Di2015NewLine                           //new {Name = "ABC", Id = 1},Di2015NewLine                           //new {Name = "Xyz", Id = 2}Di2015NewLine                           new {Name = "ABC", Id = 1, Foo = 123.22},Di2015NewLine                           new {Name = "Xyz", Id = 2, Foo = 444.11}Di2015NewLine                       };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var resultList = DynamicNewTyple(list);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in resultList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine( item.ToString() );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IQueryable DynamicNewTyple<T>(IEnumerable<T> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is basically: list.Select(x=> new Tuple<string, int, ...>(x.Name, x.Id, ...);Di2015NewLine        Expression selector = GetTupleNewExpression<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var expressionType = selector.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var funcType = expressionType.GetGenericArguments()[0]; // == Func< <>AnonType..., Tuple<String, int>>Di2015NewLine        var funcTypegenericArguments = funcType.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var inputType = funcTypegenericArguments[0];  // == <>AnonType...Di2015NewLine        var resultType = funcTypegenericArguments[1]; // == Tuple<String, int>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var selects = typeof (Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine            .AsQueryable()Di2015NewLine            .Where(x => x.Name == "Select"Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is hacky, we just hope the first method is correct, Di2015NewLine        // we should explicitly search the correct oneDi2015NewLine        var genSelectMi = selects.First(); Di2015NewLine        var selectMi = genSelectMi.MakeGenericMethod(new[] {inputType, resultType}); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = selectMi.Invoke(null, new object[] {list.AsQueryable(), selector});Di2015NewLine        return (IQueryable) result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Expression GetTupleNewExpression<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type paramType = typeof (T);Di2015NewLine        string tupleTyneName = typeof (Tuple).AssemblyQualifiedName;Di2015NewLine        int propertiesCount = paramType.GetProperties().Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( propertiesCount > 8 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(Di2015NewLine                "Currently only Tuples of up to 8 entries are alowed. You could change this code to allow stacking of Tuples!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // So far we have the non generic Tuple type. Di2015NewLine        // Now we need to create select the correct geneeric of Tuple.Di2015NewLine        // There might be a cleaner way ... you could get all types with the name 'Tuple' and Di2015NewLine        // select the one with the correct number of arguments ... that exercise is left to you!Di2015NewLine        // We employ the way of getting the AssemblyQualifiedTypeName and add the genric information Di2015NewLine        tupleTyneName = tupleTyneName.Replace("Tuple,", "Tuple`" + propertiesCount + ",");Di2015NewLine        var genericTupleType = Type.GetType(tupleTyneName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var argument = Expression.Parameter(paramType, "x");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parmList = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLine        List<Type> tupleTypes = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //we add all the properties to the tuples, this only will work for up to 8 properties (in C#4)Di2015NewLine        // We probably should use our own implementation.Di2015NewLine        // We could use a dictionary as well, but then we would need to rewrite this function Di2015NewLine        // more or less completly as we would need to call the 'Add' function of a dictionary.Di2015NewLine        foreach (var param in paramType.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parmList.Add(Expression.Property(argument, param));Di2015NewLine            tupleTypes.Add(param.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a type of the discovered tuplesDi2015NewLine        var tupleType = genericTupleType.MakeGenericType(tupleTypes.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tuplConstructor =Di2015NewLine            tupleType.GetConstructors().First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var res =Di2015NewLine            Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine                Expression.New(tuplConstructor, parmList.ToArray()),Di2015NewLine                argument);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2014224Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PollerThreadDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Thread _thread;Di2015NewLine    private SynchronizationContext _syncContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler UpdateFinished;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PollerThread()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _syncContext = WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ThreadStart threadStart = new ThreadStart(ThreadStartMethod);Di2015NewLine        _thread = new Thread(threadStart);Di2015NewLine        _thread.Name = "UpdateThread";Di2015NewLine        _thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        _thread.Priority = System.Threading.ThreadPriority.Normal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((_thread.ThreadState & ThreadState.Unstarted) == ThreadState.Unstarted)Di2015NewLine            _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Thread has already been started and may have completed already.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ThreadStartMethod()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Go get the new data from the SQL serverDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                OnUpdateFinished(); // Notify all subscribers (on their own threads)Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(10000); // 10 sec wait before the next updateDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ThreadAbortException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The thread was aborted... ignore this exception if it's safe to do soDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnUpdateFinished()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (UpdateFinished != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SendOrPostCallback method = new SendOrPostCallback(Di2015NewLine            delegate(object state)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UpdateFinished(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            _syncContext.Send(method, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2017441Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void UpdateComboDataSource<T>(ComboBox ctrl, IEnumerable<T> datasource, string displayPath, string valuePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ctrl == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("Control to be bound must not be null");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //check if we are on the control's UI thread:Di2015NewLine        if (ctrl.Dispatcher.CheckAccess())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //we have full access to the control, no threading issues, so let's rip it up and databind itDi2015NewLine            datasource = datasource.OrderBy(x => x);Di2015NewLine            if (displayPath != null && ctrl.DisplayMemberPath == null)Di2015NewLine                ctrl.DisplayMemberPath = displayPath;Di2015NewLine            if (valuePath != null && ctrl.SelectedValuePath == null)Di2015NewLine                ctrl.SelectedValuePath = valuePath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ctrl.ItemsSource = datasource;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //we don't have full access to the control because we are running on a different thread, so Di2015NewLine            //we need to marshal a call to this function from the control's UI threadDi2015NewLine            UpdateComboDataSourceDelegate<T> del = new UpdateComboDataSourceDelegate<T>(this.UpdateComboDataSource);Di2015NewLine            ctrl.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(del, ctrl, datasource, displayPath, valuePath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate delegate void UpdateComboDataSourceDelegate<T>(ComboBox ctrl, IEnumerable<T> dataSource, string displayPath, string valuePath);Di2015NewLine

2023195Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Tuple(TItem1 item1, TItem2 item2, TItem3 item3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this = new Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3>();Di2015NewLine        Item1 = item1;Di2015NewLine        Item2 = item2;Di2015NewLine        Item3 = item3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator !=(Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3> left, Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3> right)Di2015NewLine    { return left.Equals(right); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3> left, Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3> right)Di2015NewLine    { return !left.Equals(right); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TItem1 Item1 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public TItem2 Item2 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public TItem3 Item3 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj is Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3>)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var other = (Tuple<TItem1, TItem2, TItem3>)obj;Di2015NewLine            return Object.Equals(Item1, other.Item1)Di2015NewLine                && Object.Equals(Item2, other.Item2)Di2015NewLine                && Object.Equals(Item3, other.Item3);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ((this.Item1 != null) ? this.Item1.GetHashCode() : 0)Di2015NewLine             ^ ((this.Item2 != null) ? this.Item2.GetHashCode() : 0)Di2015NewLine             ^ ((this.Item3 != null) ? this.Item3.GetHashCode() : 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2024637Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Control FindControl(Control root, string name) {Di2015NewLine    if (root == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("root");Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<Control>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLine    while (stack.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine        Control item = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (item.Name == name) return item;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Control child in item.Controls) {Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2025828Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static Queue<Job> jobQueue;Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void EnqueueJob(Job job) {Di2015NewLine        lock (jobQueue) {Di2015NewLine            jobQueue.Enqueue(job);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Job DequeueJob() {Di2015NewLine        lock (jobQueue) {Di2015NewLine            return jobQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void RetrieveJob(object unused) {Di2015NewLine        Job job = ... // retrieve job from webserviceDi2015NewLine        EnqueueJob(job);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void ProcessJobs() {Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            Job job = DequeueJob();Di2015NewLine            // process jobDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        // run RetrieveJob every 5 minutes using a timerDi2015NewLine        Timer timer = new Timer(RetrieveJob);Di2015NewLine        timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(0), TimeSpan.FromMinutes(5));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // run ProcessJobs in threadDi2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread(ProcessJobs);Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // block main threadDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparatorjobQueue.Dequeue()
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static Semaphore semaphore = new Semaphore(0, int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void EnqueueJob(Job job) {Di2015NewLine        lock (jobQueue) {Di2015NewLine            jobQueue.Enqueue(job);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // signal availability of jobDi2015NewLine        semaphore.Release(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Job DequeueJob() {Di2015NewLine        // wait until job is availableDi2015NewLine        semaphore.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        lock (jobQueue) {Di2015NewLine            return jobQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void ProcessJobs() {Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            Job job = DequeueJob();Di2015NewLine            if (job == null) {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // process jobDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // when ProcessJobs returns, the thread endsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2025828Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        // run RetrieveJob every 5 minutes using a timerDi2015NewLine        Timer timer = new Timer(RetrieveJob);Di2015NewLine        timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(0), TimeSpan.FromMinutes(5));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // run ProcessJobs in threadDi2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread(ProcessJobs);Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // block main threadDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // stop the timerDi2015NewLine        timer.Change(Timeout.Infinite, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add 'null' job and wait until ProcessJobs has finishedDi2015NewLine        EnqueueJob(null);Di2015NewLine        thread.Join();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

XmlSchemaComplexType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (item is XmlSchemaSimpleType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlSchemaSimpleType simpleType = item as XmlSchemaSimpleType;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("SimpleType found with name=" + simpleType.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (item is XmlSchemaElement)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (item is XmlSchemaAnnotation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (item is XmlSchemaAttributeGroup)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (item is XmlSchemaNotation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (item is XmlSchemaGroup)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Not Implemented.");Di2015NewLine 2036774Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int LOOP = 10000000, INDEX = 100, VALUE = 512;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch watch;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < LOOP; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Set1(buffer, INDEX, VALUE);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Set1: " + watch.ElapsedMilliseconds + "ms");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < LOOP; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Set2(buffer, INDEX, VALUE);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Set2: " + watch.ElapsedMilliseconds + "ms");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < LOOP; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Set3(buffer, INDEX, VALUE);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Set3: " + watch.ElapsedMilliseconds + "ms");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < LOOP; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Set4(buffer, INDEX, VALUE);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Set4: " + watch.ElapsedMilliseconds + "ms");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    unsafe static void Set1(byte[] target, int index, int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* p = &target[0])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.WriteInt32(new IntPtr(p), index, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unsafe static void Set2(byte[] target, int index, int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int* p = &value;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; 2038088Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void richTextBox1_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    if (e.Control && e.KeyCode == Keys.V)  Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine            // suspend layout to avoid blinkingDi2015NewLine            richTextBox2.SuspendLayout();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get insertion pointDi2015NewLine            int insPt = richTextBox2.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // preserve text from after insertion pont to end of RTF contentDi2015NewLine            string postRTFContent = richTextBox2.Text.Substring(insPt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // remove the content after the insertion pointDi2015NewLine            richTextBox2.Text = richTextBox2.Text.Substring(0, insPt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add the clipboard content and then the preserved postRTF contentDi2015NewLine            richTextBox2.Text += (string)Clipboard.GetData("Text") + postRTFContent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // adjust the insertion point to just after the inserted textDi2015NewLine            richTextBox2.SelectionStart = richTextBox2.TextLength - postRTFContent.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // restore layoutDi2015NewLine            richTextBox2.ResumeLayout();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // cancel the pasteDi2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

2038390Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ProxyInstantiatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static TProxy CreateProxy<TProxy>(object source)Di2015NewLine        where TProxy : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TProxy proxy = new TProxy();Di2015NewLine        CopyProperties(source, proxy);Di2015NewLine        return proxy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected static void CopyProperties(object source, object dest)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dest == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("dest");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Type sourceType = source.GetType();Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] sourceProperties =Di2015NewLine            sourceType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine        Type destType = dest.GetType();Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] destProperties =Di2015NewLine            destType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine        var propsToCopy =Di2015NewLine            from sp in sourcePropertiesDi2015NewLine            join dp in destProperties on sp.Name equals dp.NameDi2015NewLine            select new { SourceProperty = sp, DestProperty = dp };Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in propsToCopy)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object sourceValue = p.SourceProperty.GetValue(o, null);Di2015NewLine            p.DestProperty.SetValue(dest, sourceValue, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2038422Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine// where this.port is an instance of SerialPort, ieDi2015NewLine// this.port = new SerialPort(Di2015NewLine//  portName,Di2015NewLine//  1200,Di2015NewLine//  Parity.None,Di2015NewLine//  8,Di2015NewLine//  StopBits.One);Di2015NewLine//  this.port.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override bool GetWeight(out decimal weightLB, out bool stable)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    stable = false;Di2015NewLine    weightLB = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.port.Write("W\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine        data = this.port.ReadExisting();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (data == null || data.Length < 12 || data.Substring(8, 2) != "LB")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (decimal.TryParse(data.Substring(1, 7), out weightLB))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stable = (data[11] == '0');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (TimeoutException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2038515Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("msvcrt.dll")]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern int memcmp(IntPtr b1, IntPtr b2, long count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool CompareMemCmp(Bitmap b1, Bitmap b2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((b1 == null) != (b2 == null)) return false;Di2015NewLine    if (b1.Size != b2.Size) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bd1 = b1.LockBits(new Rectangle(new Point(0, 0), b1.Size), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine    var bd2 = b2.LockBits(new Rectangle(new Point(0, 0), b2.Size), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr bd1scan0 = bd1.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr bd2scan0 = bd2.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int stride = bd1.Stride;Di2015NewLine        int len = stride * b1.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return memcmp(bd1scan0, bd2scan0, len) == 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        b1.UnlockBits(bd1);Di2015NewLine        b2.UnlockBits(bd2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2042291Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ArraysEqual<T>(T[] first, T[] second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (first == second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (first == null || second == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (first.Length != second.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer comparer = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < first.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!comparer.Equals(first[i], second[i]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2042291Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetHashCode<T>(T[] array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (array == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer comparer = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in array)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 31 + comparer.GetHashCode(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2042883Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic double DegreeBearing(Di2015NewLine    double lat1, double lon1, Di2015NewLine    double lat2, double lon2)Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    const double R = 6371; //earths radius (mean radius = 6,371km)Di2015NewLine    var dLon = ToRad(lon2-lon1);Di2015NewLine    var dPhi = Math.Log(Di2015NewLine        Math.Tan(ToRad(lat2)/2+Math.PI/4)/Math.Tan(ToRad(lat1)/2+Math.PI/4));Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(dLon) > Math.PI) Di2015NewLine        dLon = dLon > 0 ? -(2*Math.PI-dLon) : (2*Math.PI+dLon);Di2015NewLine    return ToBearing(Math.Atan2(dLon, dPhi));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static double ToRad(double degrees)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return degrees * (Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static double ToDegrees(double radians)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return radians * 180 / Math.PI;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static double ToBearing(double radians) Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    // convert radians to degrees (as bearing: 0...360)Di2015NewLine    return (ToDegrees(radians) +360) % 360;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// verify against the website exampleDi2015NewLineDegreeBearing(50.36389,-4.15694,42.35111,-71.04083);Di2015NewLine

2044434Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv;Di2015NewLineclass EntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime DateOfBirth { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string path = "data.csv";Di2015NewLine        InventData(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Entity obj in Read<Entity>(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<T> Read<T>(string path)Di2015NewLine        where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (TextReader source = File.OpenText(path))Di2015NewLine        using (CsvReader reader = new CsvReader(source,true,delimiter)) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string[] headers = reader.GetFieldHeaders();Di2015NewLine            Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine            List<MemberBinding> bindings = new List<MemberBinding>();Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(CsvReader), "row");Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo method = typeof(CsvReader).GetProperty("Item",new [] {typeof(int)}).GetGetMethod();Di2015NewLine            Expression invariantCulture = Expression.Constant(Di2015NewLine                CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, typeof(IFormatProvider));Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0 ; i < headers.Length ; i++) {Di2015NewLine                MemberInfo member = type.GetMember(headers[i]).Single();Di2015NewLine                Type finalType;Di2015NewLine                switch (member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Field: finalType = ((FieldInfo)member).FieldType; break;Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Property: finalType = ((PropertyInfo)member).PropertyType; break;Di2015NewLine                    default: throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Expression val = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                    param, method, Expression.Constant(i, typeof(int)));Di2015NewLine                if (finalType != typeof(string))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    val = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                        finalType, "Parse", null, val, invariantCulture);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                bindings.Add(Expression.Bind(member, val));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression body = Expression.MemberInit(Di2015NewLine                Expression.New(type), bindings);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Func<CsvReader, T> func = Expression.Lambda<Func<CsvReader, T>>(body, param).Compile();Di2015NewLine            while (reader.ReadNextRecord()) {Di2015NewLine                yield return func(reader);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    const char delimiter = '\\t';Di2015NewLine    static void InventData(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Random rand = new Random(123456);Di2015NewLine        using (TextWriter dest = File.CreateText(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dest.WriteLine("Id" + delimiter + "DateOfBirth" + delimiter + "Name");Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dest.Write(rand.Next(5000000));Di2015NewLine                dest.Write(delimiter);Di2015NewLine                dest.Write(new DateTime(Di2015NewLine                    rand.Next(1960, 2010),Di2015NewLine                    rand.Next(1, 13),Di2015NewLine                    rand.Next(1, 28)).ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine                dest.Write(delimiter);Di2015NewLine                dest.Write("Fred");Di2015NewLine                dest.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dest.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2045236Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string AdjustPath(string filename, string line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int tilde = GetTilde(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string[] fields = Regex.Split(line, @"\\|");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var addbackslash = new MatchEvaluator(Di2015NewLine    m => m.Groups[1].Value + "\\\\" + m.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine  string dir = Regex.Replace(fields[1], @"^([A-Z]:)([^\\\\])", addbackslash);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var addtilde = new MatchEvaluator(Di2015NewLine    m => (tilde + Int32.Parse(m.Groups[1].Value) - 1).Di2015NewLine           ToString().Di2015NewLine           PadLeft(m.Groups[1].Value.Length, '0'));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return Path.Combine(dir, Regex.Replace(fields[2], @"\\{(\\d+)-.+}", addtilde));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int GetTilde(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Match m = Regex.Match(filename, @"^.+~(\\d+)$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (!m.Success)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("Invalid filename", "filename");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return Int32.Parse(m.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2058345Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic DateTime GetNextProcessingDate(Di2015NewLine    DateTime itemCompletedDate,Di2015NewLine    int monthWithinQuarter,Di2015NewLine    int weekWithinMonthDi2015NewLine) {Di2015NewLine        if (monthWithinQuarter < 1 || monthWithinQuarter > 3) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("monthWithinQuarter");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (weekWithinMonth < 1 || weekWithinMonth > 5) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("weekWithinMonth");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int year = itemCompletedDate.Year;Di2015NewLine        DateTime[] startOfQuarters = new[] {Di2015NewLine            new DateTime(year, 1, 1),Di2015NewLine            new DateTime(year, 4, 1),Di2015NewLine            new DateTime(year, 7, 1),Di2015NewLine            new DateTime(year, 10, 1)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        DateTime startOfQuarter = startOfQuarters.Where(d => d <= itemCompletedDate)Di2015NewLine                                                 .OrderBy(d => d)Di2015NewLine                                                 .Last();Di2015NewLine        int month = startOfQuarter.Month + monthWithinQuarter - 1;Di2015NewLine        int day = (weekWithinMonth - 1) * 7 + 1;Di2015NewLine        if (day > DateTime.DaysInMonth(year, month)) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("weekWithinMonth");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DateTime candidate = new DateTime(year, month, day);Di2015NewLine        if (candidate < itemCompletedDate) {Di2015NewLine            month += 3;Di2015NewLine            if(month > 12) {Di2015NewLine                year++;Di2015NewLine                month -= 12;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new DateTime(year, month, day);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2059197Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, T>> ConsecutivePairs<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Omitted nullity checking; would need an extra method to cope withDi2015NewLine    // iterator block deferred executionDi2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator = sequence.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        T previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Tuple.Create(previous, iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2059549Di2015UniqueSeparatorbar
2059549Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bar = new Bar();Di2015NewLine        bar.Foo = "Hello, Zap";Di2015NewLine        Zap(() => bar.Foo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class BarDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public String Foo { get; set; }    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Zap<T>(Expression<Func<T>> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var param = (((source.Body as MemberExpression).Expression as MemberExpression).Expression as ConstantExpression).Value;Di2015NewLine        var type = param.GetType();Di2015NewLine        // Note that the C# compiler creates the field of the closure class Di2015NewLine        // with the name of local variable that was captured in Main()Di2015NewLine        var field = type.GetField("bar");Di2015NewLine        var bar = field.GetValue(param) as Bar;Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(bar != null);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(bar.Foo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2065708Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void PaintVignette(Graphics g, Rectangle bounds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Rectangle ellipsebounds = bounds;Di2015NewLine    ellipsebounds.Offset(-ellipsebounds.X, -ellipsebounds.Y);Di2015NewLine    int x = ellipsebounds.Width - (int)Math.Round(.70712 * ellipsebounds.Width);Di2015NewLine    int y = ellipsebounds.Height - (int)Math.Round(.70712 * ellipsebounds.Height);Di2015NewLine    ellipsebounds.Inflate(x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (GraphicsPath path = new GraphicsPath())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path.AddEllipse(ellipsebounds);Di2015NewLine        using (PathGradientBrush brush = new PathGradientBrush(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            brush.WrapMode = WrapMode.Tile;Di2015NewLine            brush.CenterColor = Color.FromArgb(0, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            brush.SurroundColors = new Color[] { Color.FromArgb(255, 0, 0, 0) };Di2015NewLine            Blend blend = new Blend();Di2015NewLine            blend.Positions = new float[] { 0.0f, 0.2f, 0.4f, 0.6f, 0.8f, 1.0F };Di2015NewLine            blend.Factors = new float[] { 0.0f, 0.5f, 1f, 1f, 1.0f, 1.0f };Di2015NewLine            brush.Blend = blend;Di2015NewLine            Region oldClip = g.Clip;Di2015NewLine            g.Clip = new Region(bounds);Di2015NewLine            g.FillRectangle(brush, ellipsebounds);Di2015NewLine            g.Clip = oldClip;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Bitmap Vignette(Bitmap b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap final = new Bitmap(b);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(final)) {Di2015NewLine        PaintVignette(g, new Rectangle(0, 0, final.Width, final.Height));Di2015NewLine        return final;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
