2066654Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void SomeMethod(int thisValue, string thatValue)  Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<object> parameters = GetParameters(() => SomeMethod(thisValue, thatValue)); Di2015NewLine    foreach (var p in parameters) Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(p); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<object> GetParameters(Expression<Action> expr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var body = (MethodCallExpression)expr.Body;Di2015NewLine    foreach (MemberExpression a in body.Arguments)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var test = ((FieldInfo)a.Member).GetValue(((ConstantExpression)a.Expression).Value);Di2015NewLine        yield return test;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2066654Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // First approach.Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<object> parameters = GetParametersFromConstants(() => SomeMethod(0, "zero"));Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in parameters)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(p);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Second approach.Di2015NewLine        int thisValue = 0;Di2015NewLine        string thatValue = "zero";Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<object> parameters2 = GetParametersFromVariables(() => SomeMethod(thisValue, thatValue));Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in parameters2)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(p);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SomeMethod(int thisValue, string thatValue) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(thisValue + " " + thatValue);Di2015NewLine    }      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<object> GetParametersFromVariables(Expression<Action> expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var body = (MethodCallExpression)expr.Body;Di2015NewLine        foreach (MemberExpression a in body.Arguments)Di2015NewLine        {               Di2015NewLine            var test = ((FieldInfo)a.Member).GetValue(((ConstantExpression)a.Expression).Value);Di2015NewLine            yield return test;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<object> GetParametersFromConstants(Expression<Action> expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var body = (MethodCallExpression)expr.Body;Di2015NewLine        foreach (ConstantExpression a in body.Arguments)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var test = a.Value;Di2015NewLine            yield return test;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2067076Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace threadtestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public delegate void DoneCallbackDelegate(int idArg, bool successArg, string messageArg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Supervisor supv = new Supervisor();Di2015NewLine            supv.LoadQueue();Di2015NewLine            supv.Dispatch();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SupervisorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Queue<Worker> pendingWork = new Queue<Worker>();Di2015NewLine        public Dictionary<int, Worker> activeWork = new Dictionary<int, Worker>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private object pendingLock = new object();Di2015NewLine        private object activeLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int maxThreads = 200;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void LoadQueue()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Worker worker = new Worker();Di2015NewLine                worker.Callback = new DoneCallbackDelegate(WorkerFinished);Di2015NewLine                lock (pendingLock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pendingWork.Enqueue(worker);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispatch()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int activeThreadCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (activeLock) { activeThreadCount = activeWork.Count; }Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lock (activeLock)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (activeWork.Count == maxThreads) break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    lock (pendingWork)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (pendingWork.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Worker worker = pendingWork.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                            Thread thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(worker.DoWork));Di2015NewLine                            thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine                            worker.ThreadId = thread.ManagedThreadId;Di2015NewLine                            lock (activeLock) { activeWork.Add(worker.ThreadId, worker); }Di2015NewLine                            thread.Start();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(200); // wait to see if any workers are done (many ways to do this)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lock (pendingLock)Di2015NewLine                    lock (activeLock)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if ((pendingWork.Count == 0) && (activeWork.Count == 0)) break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // remove finished threads from activeWork, resubmit if necessary, and update UIDi2015NewLine        public void WorkerFinished(int idArg, bool successArg, string messageArg)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (pendingLock)Di2015NewLine                lock (activeLock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Worker worker = activeWork[idArg];Di2015NewLine                    activeWork.Remove(idArg);Di2015NewLine                    if (!successArg)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // check the message or something to see if you should resubmit threadDi2015NewLine                        pendingWork.Enqueue(worker);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    // update UIDi2015NewLine                    int left = Console.CursorLeft;Di2015NewLine                    int top = Console.CursorTop;Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(string.Format("pending:{0} active:{1}        ", pendingWork.Count, activeWork.Count));Di2015NewLine                    Console.SetCursorPosition(left, top);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class WorkerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is where you put in your problem-unique stuffDi2015NewLine        public int ThreadId { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DoneCallbackDelegate callback;Di2015NewLine        public DoneCallbackDelegate Callback { set { callback = value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void DoWork()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(new Random().Next(500, 5000)); // simulate some effortDi2015NewLine                callback(ThreadId, true, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                callback(ThreadId, false, ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2068542Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyTcpListenerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set the TcpListener on port 13000.Di2015NewLine            Int32 port = 80;Di2015NewLine            IPAddress localAddr = IPAddress.Parse("127.0.0.1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // TcpListener server = new TcpListener(port);Di2015NewLine            TcpListener server = new TcpListener(localAddr, port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start listening for client requests.Di2015NewLine            server.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Enter the listening loop.Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Waiting for a connection... ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Perform a blocking call to accept requests.Di2015NewLine                // You could also user server.AcceptSocket() here.Di2015NewLine                TcpClient client = server.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Connected!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get a stream object for reading and writingDi2015NewLine                using(NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream())Di2015NewLine                using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(stream))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<byte> msg = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine                    // Loop to receive all the data sent by the client.Di2015NewLine                    string data;Di2015NewLine                    while ((data = sr.ReadLine()) != "")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Received: {0}", data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Process the data sent by the client.Di2015NewLine                        data = data.ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        msg.AddRange(System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Send back a response.Di2015NewLine                    stream.Write(msg.ToArray(), 0, msg.Count);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Sending message..");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                client.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("SocketException: {0}", e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\nHit enter to continue...");Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2070493Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Image DrawText(String text, Font font, Color textColor, Color backColor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //first, create a dummy bitmap just to get a graphics objectDi2015NewLine    Image img = new Bitmap(1, 1);Di2015NewLine    Graphics drawing = Graphics.FromImage(img);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //measure the string to see how big the image needs to beDi2015NewLine    SizeF textSize = drawing.MeasureString(text, font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //free up the dummy image and old graphics objectDi2015NewLine    img.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    drawing.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create a new image of the right sizeDi2015NewLine    img = new Bitmap((int) textSize.Width, (int)textSize.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    drawing = Graphics.FromImage(img);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //paint the backgroundDi2015NewLine    drawing.Clear(backColor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create a brush for the textDi2015NewLine    Brush textBrush = new SolidBrush(textColor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    drawing.DrawString(text, font, textBrush, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    drawing.Save();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    textBrush.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    drawing.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return img;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2074491Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CustomVisitor<T> : ITreeVisitor<T, Tree<T>> where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T v { get; set; };Di2015NewLine    public Func<Nil<T>,  Tree<T>> VisitNil  { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Func<Node<T>, Tree<T>> VisitNode { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tree<T> Visit(Nil<T>  s) { return VisitNil(s);  }Di2015NewLine    public Tree<T> Visit(Node<T> s) { return VisitNode(s); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Tree<T> Insert<T>(T v, Tree<T> tree) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return tree.Accept<Tree<T>>(new CustomVisitor<T> {Di2015NewLine        VisitNil  = s =>Di2015NewLine            return new Node<T>() { Left = Tree<T>.empty, Value = v, Right = Tree<T>.empty }; }Di2015NewLine        VisitNode = s =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (v.CompareTo(s.Value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case -1: return new Node<T>() { Left = Insert(v, s.Left), Value = s.Value, Right = s.Right };Di2015NewLine                case  1: return new Node<T>() { Left = s.Left, Value = s.Value, Right = Insert(v, s.Right) };Di2015NewLine                default: return s;Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2084224Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Point lineIntersect(Point a1, Point a2, Point b1, Point b2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float dx, dy, da, db, t, s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dx = a2.X - a1.X;Di2015NewLine    dy = a2.Y - a1.Y;Di2015NewLine    da = b2.X - b1.X;Di2015NewLine    db = b2.Y - b1.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (da * dy - db * dx == 0) {Di2015NewLine        // The segments are parallel.Di2015NewLine        return Point.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    s = (dx * (b1.Y - a1.Y) + dy * (a1.X - b1.X)) / (da * dy - db * dx);Di2015NewLine    t = (da * (a1.Y - b1.Y) + db * (b1.X - a1.X)) / (db * dx - da * dy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((s >= 0) & (s <= 1) & (t >= 0) & (t <= 1)) Di2015NewLine        return new Point((int)(a1.X + t * dx), (int)(a1.Y + t * dy));Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return Point.Empty;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2085716Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLinepublic static class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Explicitly load the assemblies that we want to reflect overDi2015NewLine        LoadAssemblies();Di2015NewLine        // Initialize our counters and our exception type listDi2015NewLine        Int32 totalPublicTypes = 0, totalExceptionTypes = 0;Di2015NewLine        List<String> exceptionTree = new List<String>();Di2015NewLine        // Iterate through all assemblies loaded in this AppDomainDi2015NewLine        foreach (Assembly a in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Iterate through all types defined in this assemblyDi2015NewLine            foreach (Type t in a.GetExportedTypes())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                totalPublicTypes++;Di2015NewLine                // Ignore type if not a public classDi2015NewLine                if (!t.IsClass || !t.IsPublic) continue;Di2015NewLine                // Build a string of the type's derivation hierarchyDi2015NewLine                StringBuilder typeHierarchy = new StringBuilder(t.FullName, 5000);Di2015NewLine                // Assume that the type is not an Exception-derived typeDi2015NewLine                Boolean derivedFromException = false;Di2015NewLine                // See if System.Exception is a base type of this typeDi2015NewLine                Type baseType = t.BaseType;Di2015NewLine                while ((baseType != null) && !derivedFromException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Append the base type to the end of the stringDi2015NewLine                    typeHierarchy.Append("-" + baseType);Di2015NewLine                    derivedFromException = (baseType == typeof(System.Exception));Di2015NewLine                    baseType = baseType.BaseType;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // No more bases and not Exception-derived, try next typeDi2015NewLine                if (!derivedFromException) continue;Di2015NewLine                // We found an Exception-derived typeDi2015NewLine                totalExceptionTypes++;Di2015NewLine                // For this Exception-derived type,Di2015NewLine                // reverse the order of the types in the hierarchyDi2015NewLine                String[] h = typeHierarchy.ToString().Split('-');Di2015NewLine                Array.Reverse(h);Di2015NewLine                // Build a new string with the hierarchy in orderDi2015NewLine                // from Exception -> Exception-derived typeDi2015NewLine                // Add the string to the list of Exception typesDi2015NewLine                exceptionTree.Add(String.Join("-", h, 1, h.Length - 1));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Sort the Exception types together in order of their hierarchyDi2015NewLine        exceptionTree.Sort();Di2015NewLine        // Display the Exception treeDi2015NewLine        foreach (String s in exceptionTree)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // For this Exception type, split its base types apartDi2015NewLine            string[] x = s.Split('-');Di2015NewLine            // Indent based on the number of base typesDi2015NewLine            // and then show the most-derived typeDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(new String(' ', 3 * x.Length) + x[x.Length - 1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Show final status of the types consideredDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\n---> of {0} types, {1} are " +Di2015NewLine        "derived from System.Exception.",Di2015NewLine        totalPublicTypes, totalExceptionTypes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void LoadAssemblies()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String[] assemblies = {Di2015NewLine                "System, PublicKeyToken={0}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Data, PublicKeyToken={0}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Design, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.DirectoryServices, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Drawing, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Drawing.Design, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Management, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Messaging, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Runtime.Remoting, PublicKeyToken={0}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Security, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.ServiceProcess, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Web, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Web.RegularExpressions, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Web.Services, PublicKeyToken={1}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Windows.Forms, PublicKeyToken={0}",Di2015NewLine                "System.Xml, PublicKeyToken={0}",Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine        String EcmaPublicKeyToken = "b77a5c561934e089";Di2015NewLine        String MSPublicKeyToken = "b03f5f7f11d50a3a";Di2015NewLine        // Get the version of the assembly containing System.ObjectDi2015NewLine        // We'll assume the same version for all the other assembliesDi2015NewLine        Version version =Di2015NewLine        typeof(System.Object).Assembly.GetName().Version;Di2015NewLine        // Explicitly load the assemblies that we want to reflect overDi2015NewLine        foreach (String a in assemblies)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String Assemblyldentity =Di2015NewLine            String.Format(a, EcmaPublicKeyToken, MSPublicKeyToken) +Di2015NewLine            ", Culture=neutral, Version=" + version;Di2015NewLine            Assembly.Load(AssemblyIdentity);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2085872Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IEnumerable<string> WalkFiles(string path, string filter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var pending = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine        pending.Enqueue(path);Di2015NewLine        string[] tmp;Di2015NewLine        while (pending.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            path = pending.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            tmp = Directory.GetFiles(path, filter);Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0 ; i < tmp.Length ; i++) {Di2015NewLine                yield return tmp[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            tmp = Directory.GetDirectories(path);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < tmp.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                pending.Enqueue(tmp[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return revision;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                revision = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creates a new <see cref="ModuleVersion"/> instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public ModuleVersion()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.build = -1;Di2015NewLine            this.revision = -1;Di2015NewLine            this.major = 0;Di2015NewLine            this.minor = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creates a new <see cref="ModuleVersion"/> instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="version">Version.</param>Di2015NewLine        public ModuleVersion(string version)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.build = -1;Di2015NewLine            this.revision = -1;Di2015NewLine            if (version == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("version");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            char[] chArray1 = new char[1] { '.' };Di2015NewLine            string[] textArray1 = version.Split(chArray1);Di2015NewLine            int num1 = textArray1.Length;Di2015NewLine            if ((num1 < 2) || (num1 > 4))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new         throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("build", "ArgumentOutOfRange_Version");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                num1--;Di2015NewLine                if (num1 >                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creates a new <see cref="ModuleVersion"/> instance.Di2015NewLine        /// 2087673Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int MyReplace(ref string source,Di2015NewLine    string org, string replace, int start, int max)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (start < 0) throw new System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException("start");Di2015NewLine    if (max <= 0) return 0;Di2015NewLine    start = source.IndexOf(org, start);Di2015NewLine    if (start < 0) return 0;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(source, 0, start, source.Length);Di2015NewLine    int found = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (max-- > 0) {Di2015NewLine        int index = source.IndexOf(org, start);Di2015NewLine        if (index < 0) break;Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(source, start, index - start).Append(replace);Di2015NewLine        start = index + org.Length;Di2015NewLine        found++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(source, start, source.Length - start);Di2015NewLine    source = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    return found;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2087739Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static Bitmap WatermarkImage(Bitmap bmpOriginal, String waterMarkLeft, String waterMarkRight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics gfxOriginal = Graphics.FromImage(bmpOriginal))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Font fntWatermark = new Font("Arial", 12, FontStyle.Regular))Di2015NewLine            {                    Di2015NewLine                SizeF szWatermarkLeft = gfxOriginal.MeasureString(waterMarkLeft, fntWatermark, int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine                SizeF szWatermarkRight = gfxOriginal.MeasureString(waterMarkRight, fntWatermark, int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                float heightWatermark = szWatermarkLeft.Height > szWatermarkRight.Height ? szWatermarkLeft.Height : szWatermarkRight.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Bitmap bmpWatermarked = new Bitmap(bmpOriginal.Width, bmpOriginal.Height + (int)(heightWatermark * 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (Graphics gfxWatermarked = Graphics.FromImage(bmpWatermarked))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    gfxWatermarked.Clear(Color.White);Di2015NewLine                    gfxWatermarked.DrawImageUnscaled(bmpOriginal, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine                    gfxWatermarked.DrawString(waterMarkLeft, fntWatermark, Brushes.Black, 0, (bmpOriginal.Height + heightWatermark) - (szWatermarkLeft.Height / 2));Di2015NewLine                    gfxWatermarked.DrawString(waterMarkRight, fntWatermark, Brushes.Black, (bmpOriginal.Width - szWatermarkRight.Width), (bmpOriginal.Height + heightWatermark) - (heightWatermark / 2));                        Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return bmpWatermarked;                                        Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2088543Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Camera::ComputeVectors()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Matrix4x4 rotX, rotZ;Di2015NewLine    Quaternion q_x, q_y, q_z;Di2015NewLine    Quaternion q_yx, q_yz;Di2015NewLine    q_x.FromAngleAxis(radians.x, startAxisX);Di2015NewLine    q_y.FromAngleAxis(radians.y, startAxisY);Di2015NewLine    q_z.FromAngleAxis(radians.z, startAxisZ);Di2015NewLine    q_yx = q_y * q_x;Di2015NewLine    q_yx.ToMatrix(rotZ);Di2015NewLine    q_yz = q_y * q_z;Di2015NewLine    q_yz.ToMatrix(rotX);Di2015NewLine    axisX = startAxisX;Di2015NewLine    axisZ = startAxisZ; Di2015NewLine    axisX.Transform(rotX);Di2015NewLine    axisZ.Transform(rotZ);Di2015NewLine    axisY = axisX.Cross(axisZ);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    position = startPosition;Di2015NewLine    position -= center;Di2015NewLine    position.Transform(q_yx);Di2015NewLine    position += center;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2088849Di2015UniqueSeparator    static Expression MyGreaterThan(Expression e1, Expression e2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (IsNullableType(e1.Type) && !IsNullableType(e2.Type))Di2015NewLine            e2 = Expression.Convert(e2, e1.Type);Di2015NewLine        else if (!IsNullableType(e1.Type) && IsNullableType(e2.Type))Di2015NewLine            e1 = Expression.Convert(e1, e2.Type);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.GreaterThan(e1, e2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static bool IsNullableType(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return t.IsGenericType && t.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2089555Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> SortResults<T>(List<T> listRow, Di2015NewLine                                     string sortColumn,Di2015NewLine                                     bool ascending)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo field = typeof(T).GetField(sortColumn);Di2015NewLine    Func<T, object> projection = t => field.GetValue(t);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> sequence = ascending ? listRow.OrderBy(projection)Di2015NewLine        : listRow.OrderByDescending(projection);Di2015NewLine    return sequence.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Enumerable.Range(0, x.Length);Di2015NewLine        x = (from n in range orderby x[n] select y[n]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        y = (from n in range orderby x[n] select x[n]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SortMethod3(double[] x, double[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] x_index = Di2015NewLine            Enumerable.Range(0, x.Length).OrderBy(i => x[i]).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = x_index.Select(i => x[i]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        y = x_index.Select(i => y[i]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SortMethod4(double[] x, double[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] range =Di2015NewLine            Enumerable.Range(0, x.Length).OrderBy(i => x[i]).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var q = (Di2015NewLine            from n in rangeDi2015NewLine            orderby x[n]Di2015NewLine            select new { First = x[n], Second = y[n] }).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = q.Select(t => t.First).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        y = q.Select(t => t.Second).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SortMethodPerformanceTest(SortMethod sortMethod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double[] y_sorted = y.Clone() as double[];Di2015NewLine        double[] x_sorted = x.Clone() as double[];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        sortMethod.Invoke(x_sorted, y_sorted);Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            string.Format(Di2015NewLine                "{0} : {1}",Di2015NewLine                sortMethod.Method.Name,Di2015NewLine                sw.Elapsed));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("For array length : " + ARRAY_SIZE);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("------------------------------");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 2095321Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Partition(int[] array, int left, int right, int pivotIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int pivValue = array[pivotIndex];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Swap(array, pivotIndex, right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int storeIndex = left;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = left; i < right; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (array[i] <= pivValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Swap(array, i, storeIndex);Di2015NewLine            storeIndex = storeIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Swap(array, storeIndex, right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return storeIndex;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Swap(int[] arr, int first, int second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int temp = arr[first];Di2015NewLine    arr[first] = arr[second];Di2015NewLine    arr[second] = temp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void DoQuickSort(int[] array, int left, int right)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (right > left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pivIndex = (left + right) / 2;Di2015NewLine        int newPivIndex = Partition(array, left, right, pivIndex);Di2015NewLine        DoQuickSort(array, left, newPivIndex - 1);Di2015NewLine        DoQuickSort(array, newPivIndex + 1, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2095988Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Convert a name into a string that can be appended to a Uri.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate static string EscapeName(string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(name))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        name = NormalizeString(name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Replaces all non-alphanumeric character by a spaceDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < name.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(char.IsLetterOrDigit(name[i]) ? name[i] : ' ');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        name = builder.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Replace multiple spaces into a single dashDi2015NewLine        name = Regex.Replace(name, @"[ ]{1,}", @"-", RegexOptions.None);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Strips the value from any non english character by replacing thoses with their english equivalent.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value">The string to normalize.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A string where all characters are part of the basic english ANSI encoding.</returns>Di2015NewLine/// <seealso cref="http://stackoverflow.com/questions/249087/how-do-i-remove-diacritics-accents-from-a-string-in-net"/>Di2015NewLineprivate static string NormalizeString(string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string normalizedFormD = value.Normalize(NormalizationForm.FormD);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < normalizedFormD.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UnicodeCategory uc = CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory(normalizedFormD[i]);Di2015NewLine        if (uc != UnicodeCategory.NonSpacingMark)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(normalizedFormD[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return builder.ToString().Normalize(NormalizationForm.FormC);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2100216Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool IsSummable(Type type)Di2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ParameterExpression paramA = Expression.Parameter(type, "a"), paramB = Expression.Parameter(type, "b");Di2015NewLine  BinaryExpression addExpression = Expression.Add(paramA, paramB);Di2015NewLine  var add = Expression.Lambda(addExpression, paramA, paramB).Compile();Di2015NewLine  var v = Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine  add.DynamicInvoke(v, v);Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2100216Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool IsAveragable(Type type)Di2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ParameterExpression paramA = Expression.Parameter(type, "a"), paramB = Expression.Parameter(type, "b");Di2015NewLine        // add the parameters togetherDi2015NewLine        BinaryExpression addExpression = Expression.Add(paramA, paramB);Di2015NewLine        var avg = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "b");Di2015NewLine        var conv  = Expression.Convert(avg,type);Di2015NewLine        BinaryExpression devideExpression = Expression.Divide(paramA, conv);Di2015NewLine        // compile itDi2015NewLine        var add = Expression.Lambda(addExpression, paramA, paramB).Compile();Di2015NewLine        var devide = Expression.Lambda(devideExpression, paramA, avg).Compile();Di2015NewLine        var v = Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine        add.DynamicInvoke(v, v);Di2015NewLine        devide.DynamicInvoke(v, 1);Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2102355Di2015UniqueSeparator        //Source stringDi2015NewLine        string value1 = "t";Di2015NewLine        //Length in bitsDi2015NewLine        int length1 = 2;Di2015NewLine        //Convert the text to an array of ASCII bytesDi2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(value1);Di2015NewLine        //Create a temp BitArray from the bytesDi2015NewLine        System.Collections.BitArray tempBits = new System.Collections.BitArray(bytes);Di2015NewLine        //Create the output BitArray setting the maximum lengthDi2015NewLine        System.Collections.BitArray bitValue1 = new System.Collections.BitArray(length1);Di2015NewLine        //Loop through the temp arrayDi2015NewLine        for(int i=0;i<tempBits.Length;i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //If we're outside of the range of the output array exitDi2015NewLine            if (i >= length1) break;Di2015NewLine            //Otherwise copy the value from the temp to the outputDi2015NewLine            bitValue1.Set(i, tempBits.Get(i));                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2104742Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String thing = "test";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression<Action<String>> expression = c => c.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    Delegate del = expression.Compile();Di2015NewLine    del.DynamicInvoke(thing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<String, Delegate> cache = new Dictionary<String, Delegate>();Di2015NewLine    cache.Add(GenerateKey(expression), del);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression<Action<String>> expression1 = d => d.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    var test = cache.ContainsKey(GenerateKey(expression1));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(test);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GenerateKey(Expression<Action<String>> expr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression newParam = Expression.Parameter(expr.Parameters[0].Type);Di2015NewLine    Expression newExprBody = Expression.Call(newParam, ((MethodCallExpression)expr.Body).Method);Di2015NewLine    Expression<Action<String>> newExpr = Expression.Lambda<Action<String>>(newExprBody, newParam);Di2015NewLine    return newExpr.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2107294Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetFileList(string fileSearchPattern, string rootFolderPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Queue<string> pending = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine    pending.Enqueue(rootFolderPath);Di2015NewLine    string[] tmp;Di2015NewLine    while (pending.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rootFolderPath = pending.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        tmp = Directory.GetFiles(rootFolderPath, fileSearchPattern);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < tmp.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return tmp[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tmp = Directory.GetDirectories(rootFolderPath);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < tmp.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pending.Enqueue(tmp[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2111584Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Run()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string filename = "MikeD.txt";Di2015NewLine    using (var tr = new StreamReader(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string line = null;Di2015NewLine        while ((line= tr.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Console.WriteLine("#orig: {0}",line);Di2015NewLine            var tokens = line.Split('|');Di2015NewLine            if (tokens.Length == 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // find first numeric digit in tokens[0]Di2015NewLine                int n=0;Di2015NewLine                while(tokens[0][n]<'0' || tokens[0][n]>'9') n++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // get the base for the first output argumentDi2015NewLine                int b1 = Int32.Parse(tokens[0].Substring(n));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // get the prefix for the first output argDi2015NewLine                string prefix = tokens[0].Substring(0,n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // find the beginning index in tokens[2]Di2015NewLine                var p1 = tokens[2].Substring(1).Split('-');Di2015NewLine                int b2 = Int32.Parse(p1[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // find the extension in tokens[2]Di2015NewLine                var p2 = tokens[2].Split('.');Di2015NewLine                string ext = p2[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // determine how many lines to outputDi2015NewLine                int x = Int32.Parse(tokens[3]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // output the linesDi2015NewLine                for (int i=0; i < x; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    System.Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}|{2}|{3}.{4}",Di2015NewLine                                             prefix,Di2015NewLine                                             b1+i,Di2015NewLine                                             tokens[1],Di2015NewLine                                             b2+i,Di2015NewLine                                             extDi2015NewLine                                             );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Console.WriteLine("-bad input-");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2113826Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DateTime GetNTPTime()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // 0x1B == 0b11011 == NTP version 3, client - see RFC 2030Di2015NewLine    byte[] ntpPacket = new byte[] { 0x1B, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                            0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                            0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                            0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                            0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                            0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IPAddress[] addressList = Dns.GetHostEntry("pool.ntp.org").AddressList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (addressList.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // errorDi2015NewLine        return DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IPEndPoint ep = new IPEndPoint(addressList[0], 123);Di2015NewLine    UdpClient client = new UdpClient();Di2015NewLine    client.Connect(ep);Di2015NewLine    client.Send(ntpPacket, ntpPacket.Length);Di2015NewLine    byte[] data = client.Receive(ref ep);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // receive date data is at offset 32Di2015NewLine    // Data is 64 bits - first 32 is seconds - we'll toss the fraction of a secondDi2015NewLine    // it is not in an endian order, so we must rearrangeDi2015NewLine    byte[] endianSeconds = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine    endianSeconds[0] = data[32 + 3];Di2015NewLine    endianSeconds[1] = data[32 + 2];Di2015NewLine    endianSeconds[2] = data[32 + 1];Di2015NewLine    endianSeconds[3] = data[32 + 0];Di2015NewLine    uint seconds = BitConverter.ToUInt32(endianSeconds, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (new DateTime(1900, 1, 1)).AddSeconds(seconds);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2120470Di2015UniqueSeparatorTryParse
2120470Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i; float f; decimal d;Di2015NewLine        if (Test.TryParse("123", out i)) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (Test.TryParse("123.45", out f)) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(f);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (Test.TryParse("123.4567", out d)) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static class TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool TryParse<T>(string s, out T value) {Di2015NewLine        return Cache<T>.TryParse(s, out value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static class Cache<T> {Di2015NewLine        public static bool TryParse(string s, out T value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return func(s, out value);Di2015NewLine        }    Di2015NewLine        delegate bool TryPattern(string s, out T value);Di2015NewLine        private static readonly TryPattern func;Di2015NewLine        static Cache()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo method = typeof(T).GetMethod(Di2015NewLine                "TryParse", new Type[] { typeof(string), typeof(T).MakeByRefType() });Di2015NewLine            if (method == null) {Di2015NewLine                if (typeof(T) == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine                    func = delegate(string x, out T y) { y = (T)(object)x; return true; };Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    func = delegate(string x, out T y) { y = default(T); return false; };Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                func = (TryPattern) Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(TryPattern),method);Di2015NewLine            }            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2120898Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<Employee> _Employees;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void btnUp_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Button btnUp = sender as Button;Di2015NewLine    int employeeID = int.Parse(btnUp.CommandArgument); // get the bound PKDi2015NewLine    Employee toMoveUp = _Employees.Where(e=>e.EmployeeID == employeeID).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    // assuming PlaceInLine is unique among all employees...Di2015NewLine    Employee toMoveDown = _Employees.Where(e=>e.PlaceInLine == toMoveUp.PlaceInLine + 1).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // at this point you need to ++ the employees sequence andDi2015NewLine    // -- the employee ahead of him  (e.g. move 5 to 6 and 6 to 5)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    toMoveUp.PlaceInLine ++;Di2015NewLine    toMoveDown.PlaceInLine --;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // save the list Di2015NewLine    DataAccessLayer.Save(_Employees);Di2015NewLine    //rebind the listivewDi2015NewLine    myListView.DataBind();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2128618Di2015UniqueSeparator//In constructor or in method StartDi2015NewLinevar tcpServer = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, port);Di2015NewLinetcpServer.Start();Di2015NewLinetcpServer.BeginAcceptSocket(EndAcceptSocket, tcpServer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//In EndAcceptSocketDi2015NewLineSocket sock= lister.EndAcceptSocket(asyncResult);Di2015NewLinevar e = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLinee.Completed += ReceiveCompleted; //some data receive handleDi2015NewLinee.SetBuffer(new byte[SocketBufferSize], 0, SocketBufferSize);Di2015NewLineif (!sock.ReceiveAsync(e))Di2015NewLine{//IO operation finished syncronouslyDi2015NewLine  //handle received dataDi2015NewLine  ReceiveCompleted(sock, e);Di2015NewLine}//IO operation finished syncronouslyDi2015NewLine//Add sock to internal storageDi2015NewLine
2128618Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace AmpleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class IPEndPointEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public IPEndPointEventArgs(IPEndPoint ipEndPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IPEndPoint = ipEndPoint;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IPEndPoint IPEndPoint { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DataReceivedEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public DataReceivedEventArgs(byte[] data, IPEndPoint ipEndPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Data = data;Di2015NewLine            IPEndPoint = ipEndPoint;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public byte[] Data { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public IPEndPoint IPEndPoint { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// TcpListner wrapperDi2015NewLine    /// Encapsulates asyncronous communications using TCP/IP.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public sealed class TcpServer : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //Construction, DestructionDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creating server socketDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="port">Server port number</param>Di2015NewLine        public TcpServer(int port)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connectedSockets = new Dictionary<IPEndPoint, Socket>();Di2015NewLine            tcpServer = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, port);Di2015NewLine            tcpServer.Start();Di2015NewLine            tcpServer.BeginAcceptSocket(EndAcceptSocket, tcpServer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ~TcpServer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DisposeImpl(false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DisposeImpl(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //Public MethodsDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void SendData(byte[] data, IPEndPoint endPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Socket sock;Di2015NewLine            lock (syncHandle)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!connectedSockets.ContainsKey(endPoint))Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                sock = connectedSockets[endPoint];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sock.Send(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //EventsDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<IPEndPointEventArgs> SocketConnected;Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<IPEndPointEventArgs> SocketDisconnected;Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<DataReceivedEventArgs> DataReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //Private FunctionsDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        #region Private FunctionsDi2015NewLine        //  ??Di2015NewLine        private void Connected(Socket socket)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var endPoint = (IPEndPoint)socket.RemoteEndPoint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (connectedSocketsSyncHandle)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (connectedSockets.ContainsKey(endPoint))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    theLog.Log.DebugFormat("TcpServer.Connected: Socket already connected! Removing from local storage! EndPoint: {0}", endPoint);Di2015NewLine                    connectedSockets[endPoint].Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SetDesiredKeepAlive(socket);Di2015NewLine                connectedSockets[endPoint] = socket;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OnSocketConnected(endPoint);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SetDesiredKeepAlive(Socket socket)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            socket.SetSocketOption(SocketOptionLevel.Socket, SocketOptionName.KeepAlive, true);Di2015NewLine            const uint time = 10000;Di2015NewLine            const uint interval = 20000;Di2015NewLine            SetKeepAlive(socket, true, time, interval);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        static void SetKeepAlive(Socket s, bool on, uint time, uint interval)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* the native structureDi2015NewLine            struct tcp_keepalive {Di2015NewLine            ULONG onoff;Di2015NewLine            ULONG keepalivetime;Di2015NewLine            ULONG keepaliveinterval;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // marshal the equivalent of the native structure into a byte arrayDi2015NewLine            uint dummy = 0;Di2015NewLine            var inOptionValues = new byte[Marshal.SizeOf(dummy) * 3];Di2015NewLine            BitConverter.GetBytes((uint)(on ? 1 : 0)).CopyTo(inOptionValues, 0);Di2015NewLine            BitConverter.GetBytes((uint)time).CopyTo(inOptionValues, Marshal.SizeOf(dummy));Di2015NewLine            BitConverter.GetBytes((uint)interval).CopyTo(inOptionValues, Marshal.SizeOf(dummy) * 2);Di2015NewLine            // of course there are other ways to marshal up this byte array, this is just one wayDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // call WSAIoctl via IOControlDi2015NewLine            int ignore = s.IOControl(IOControlCode.KeepAliveValues, inOptionValues, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //socket disconnected handlerDi2015NewLine        private void Disconnect(Socket socket)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var endPoint = (IPEndPoint)socket.RemoteEndPoint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (connectedSocketsSyncHandle)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                connectedSockets.Remove(endPoint);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            socket.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OnSocketDisconnected(endPoint);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ReceiveData(byte[] data, IPEndPoint endPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OnDataReceived(data, endPoint);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void EndAcceptSocket(IAsyncResult asyncResult)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var lister = (TcpListener)asyncResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine            theLog.Log.Debug("TcpServer.EndAcceptSocket");Di2015NewLine            if (disposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                theLog.Log.Debug("TcpServer.EndAcceptSocket: tcp server already disposed!");Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Socket sock;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sock = lister.EndAcceptSocket(asyncResult);Di2015NewLine                    theLog.Log.DebugFormat("TcpServer.EndAcceptSocket: remote end point: {0}", sock.RemoteEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                    Connected(sock);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //EndAcceptSocket can failes, but in any case we want to accept Di2015NewLinenew connectionsDi2015NewLine                    lister.BeginAcceptSocket(EndAcceptSocket, lister);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //we can use this only from .net framework 2.0 SP1 and higherDi2015NewLine                var e = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLine                e.Completed += ReceiveCompleted;Di2015NewLine                e.SetBuffer(new byte[SocketBufferSize], 0, SocketBufferSize);Di2015NewLine                BeginReceiveAsync(sock, e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                theLog.Log.Error("TcpServer.EndAcceptSocket: failes!", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                theLog.Log.Error("TcpServer.EndAcceptSocket: failes!", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void BeginReceiveAsync(Socket sock, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!sock.ReceiveAsync(e))Di2015NewLine            {//IO operation finished syncronouslyDi2015NewLine                //handle received dataDi2015NewLine                ReceiveCompleted(sock, e);Di2015NewLine            }//IO operation finished syncronouslyDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void ReceiveCompleted(object sender, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sock = (Socket)sender;Di2015NewLine            if (!sock.Connected)Di2015NewLine                Disconnect(sock);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int size = e.BytesTransferred;Di2015NewLine                if (size == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //this implementation based on IO Completion ports, and in this caseDi2015NewLine                    //receiving zero bytes mean socket disconnectionDi2015NewLine                    Disconnect(sock);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var buf = new byte[size];Di2015NewLine                    Array.Copy(e.Buffer, buf, size);Di2015NewLine                    ReceiveData(buf, (IPEndPoint)sock.RemoteEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                    BeginReceiveAsync(sock, e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //We can't truly handle this excpetion here, but unhandledDi2015NewLine                //exception caused process termination.Di2015NewLine                //You can add new event to notify observerDi2015NewLine                theLog.Log.Error("TcpServer: receive data error!", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                theLog.Log.Error("TcpServer: receive data error!", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DisposeImpl(bool manualDispose)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (manualDispose)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //We should manually close all connected socketsDi2015NewLine                Exception error = null;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (tcpServer != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        disposed = true;Di2015NewLine                        tcpServer.Stop();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    theLog.Log.Error("TcpServer: tcpServer.Stop() failes!", ex);Di2015NewLine                    error = ex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var sock in connectedSockets.Values)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sock.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //During one socket disconnected we can faced exceptionDi2015NewLine                    theLog.Log.Error("TcpServer: close accepted socket failes!", ex);Di2015NewLine                    error = ex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if ( error != null )Di2015NewLine                    throw error;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnSocketConnected(IPEndPoint ipEndPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var handler = SocketConnected;Di2015NewLine            if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine                handler(this, new IPEndPointEventArgs(ipEndPoint));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnSocketDisconnected(IPEndPoint ipEndPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var handler = SocketDisconnected;Di2015NewLine            if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine                handler(this, new IPEndPointEventArgs(ipEndPoint));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private void OnDataReceived(byte[] data, IPEndPoint ipEndPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var handler = DataReceived;Di2015NewLine            if ( handler != null )Di2015NewLine                handler(this, new DataReceivedEventArgs(data, ipEndPoint));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregion Private FunctionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //Private FieldsDi2015NewLine        //----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        #region Private FieldsDi2015NewLine        private const int SocketBufferSize = 1024;Di2015NewLine        private readonly TcpListener tcpServer;Di2015NewLine        private bool disposed;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<IPEndPoint, Socket> connectedSockets;Di2015NewLine        private readonly object connectedSocketsSyncHandle = new object();Di2015NewLine        #endregion Private FieldsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2133555Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PropertyScannerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Func<TType, bool> CreatePredicate<TType, TValue>(TValue value, IEqualityComparer<TValue> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var arg = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TType), "arg");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression body = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TValue, TValue, bool>> compare = (val1, val2) => comparer.Equals(val1, val2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo property in typeof(TType).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (property.PropertyType == typeof(TValue) || typeof(TValue).IsAssignableFrom(property.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Expression prop = Expression.Equal(Expression.Invoke(compare, new Expression[]Di2015NewLine                                       {Di2015NewLine                                           Expression.Constant(value),Di2015NewLine                                           Expression.Property(arg, property.Name)Di2015NewLine                                       }),Di2015NewLine                                               Expression.Constant(0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (body == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    body = prop;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    body = Expression.OrElse(body, prop);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TType, bool>>(body, arg).Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TType> ScanProperties<TType, TValue>(this IEnumerable<TType> source, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ScanProperties<TType, TValue>(source, value, EqualityComparer<TValue>.Default);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TType> ScanProperties<TType, TValue>(this IEnumerable<TType> source, TValue value, IEqualityComparer<TValue> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.Where(CreatePredicate<TType, TValue>(value, comparer));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2134446Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string beginningFile;Di2015NewLine    string location;Di2015NewLine    string[] files;Di2015NewLine    int[] count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyObject(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] barSplit = input.Split(new char[1] { '|' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        beginningFile = barSplit[0];Di2015NewLine        location = barSplit[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] semiSplit = barSplit[2].Split(new char[1] { ';' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        List<string> f = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        List<int> c = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        Regex r = new Regex(@"\\{(\\d+)\\-(\\d+)\\}");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string s in semiSplit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            f.Add(s.Trim());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (s.Contains("{"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Match m = r.Match(s);Di2015NewLine                int x = Convert.ToInt32(m.Groups[2].Value) - Convert.ToInt32(m.Groups[1].Value) + 1;Di2015NewLine                c.Add(x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                c.Add(1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        files = f.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        count = c.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            text += string.Format("{0}|{1}|{2}|{3}\\n", beginningFile, location, files[i], count[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2136027Di2015UniqueSeparator// Handle the BeforeExpand eventDi2015NewLineprivate void treeView1_BeforeExpand(object sender, TreeViewCancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   if (e.Node.Tag != null) {Di2015NewLine       AddTopDirectories(e.Node, (string)e.Node.Tag);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void AddTopDirectories(TreeNode node, string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    node.BeginUpdate(); // for best performanceDi2015NewLine    node.Nodes.Clear(); // clear dummy node if existsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        string[] subdirs = Directory.GetDirectories(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string subdir in subdirs) {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode child = new TreeNode(subdir);Di2015NewLine            child.Tag = subdir; // save dir in tagDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if have subdirs, add dummy nodeDi2015NewLine            // to display the [+] allowing expansionDi2015NewLine            if (Directory.GetDirectories(subdir).Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine                child.Nodes.Add(new TreeNode()); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            node.Nodes.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } catch (UnauthorizedAccessException) { // ignore dirDi2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine        node.EndUpdate(); // need to be called because we called BeginUpdateDi2015NewLine        node.Tag = null; // clear tagDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2136158Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class OrderByExtenderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IOrderedEnumerable<T> OrderBy<T>(this IEnumerable<T> collection, string key, string direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression sortLambda = BuildLambda<T>(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(direction.ToUpper() == "ASC")Di2015NewLine            return collection.OrderBy((Func<T, object>)sortLambda.Compile());Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return collection.OrderByDescending((Func<T, object>)sortLambda.Compile());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IOrderedEnumerable<T> ThenBy<T>(this IOrderedEnumerable<T> collection, string key, string direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression sortLambda = BuildLambda<T>(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (direction.ToUpper() == "ASC")Di2015NewLine            return collection.ThenBy((Func<T, object>)sortLambda.Compile());Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return collection.ThenByDescending((Func<T, object>)sortLambda.Compile());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static LambdaExpression BuildLambda<T>(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression TParameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "p");Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression sortLambda = Expression.Lambda(Expression.Convert(Expression.Property(TParameterExpression, key), typeof(object)), TParameterExpression);Di2015NewLine        return sortLambda;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2136307Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> WhereNotIn<T, TValue>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<T> query,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, TValue>> propertySelector,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TValue> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (propertySelector == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("propertySelector");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (values == null || !values.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return query.Where(i => true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var param = propertySelector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine    var unequals = values.Select(value => (Expression)Expression.NotEqual(propertySelector.Body, Expression.Constant(value, typeof(TValue))));Di2015NewLine    var body = unequals.Aggregate<Expression>((accumulate, unequal) => Expression.And(accumulate, unequal));Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query.Where(lambda);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2138724Di2015UniqueSeparatorIPAddressRange
2138724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IPAddressRangeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly AddressFamily addressFamily;Di2015NewLine    readonly byte[] lowerBytes;Di2015NewLine    readonly byte[] upperBytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IPAddressRange(IPAddress lower, IPAddress upper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Assert that lower.AddressFamily == upper.AddressFamilyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.addressFamily = lower.AddressFamily;Di2015NewLine        this.lowerBytes = lower.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine        this.upperBytes = upper.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsInRange(IPAddress address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (address.AddressFamily != addressFamily)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] addressBytes = address.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool lowerBoundary = true, upperBoundary = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < this.lowerBytes.Length && Di2015NewLine            (lowerBoundary || upperBoundary); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((lowerBoundary && addressBytes[i] < lowerBytes[i]) ||Di2015NewLine                (upperBoundary && addressBytes[i] > upperBytes[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lowerBoundary &= (addressBytes[i] == lowerBytes[i]);Di2015NewLine            upperBoundary &= (addressBytes[i] == upperBytes[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2141100Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static decimal FormatDecimal(decimal i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        decimal milli = i;Di2015NewLine        decimal grams = decimal.Round(i / 1000m, 4);Di2015NewLine        decimal kilo = decimal.Round(grams / 1000m, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (kilo * 1000 * 1000 == milli)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return kilo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (grams * 1000 == milli)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return grams;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return milli;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2141100Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void FormatDecimalTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(116000000.0000m) == 116.0000m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok1");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(66990000.0000m) == 66.9900m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok2");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(49000010.0000m) == 49000.0100m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok3");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(49000000.0100m) == 49000000.0100m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok4");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(1001m) == 1.0010m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok5");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(1000m) == 0.0010m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok6");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(1100m) == 0.0011m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok7");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(1100m) == 0.0011m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok8");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(135005m) == 135.0050m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok9");Di2015NewLine        if (FormatDecimal(10013500m) == 10.0135m)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ok10");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
2141100Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static decimal FormatDecimal(decimal i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<decimal> myFactors = new List<decimal>()Di2015NewLine        { 1000m * 1000m, 1000m};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (decimal conversionFactor in myFactors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            decimal result = decimal.Round(i / conversionFactor, 4);Di2015NewLine            if (result * conversionFactor == i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2144961Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Attack(Character target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int chanceToHit = CalculateHitChance(target);Di2015NewLine    int hitTest = Random.Next(100);Di2015NewLine    if (hitTest < chanceToHit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int damage = CalculateDamage(target);Di2015NewLine        target.TakeDamage(damage);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected int CalculateHitChance(Character target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Dexterity + BaseHitChance - target.Evade;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected int CalculateDamage(Character target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Strength * 2 + Weapon.DamageRating - target.Armor.ArmorRating -Di2015NewLine        (target.Toughness / 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2144961Di2015UniqueSeparatorCharacter
2144961Di2015UniqueSeparatorCharacter
2144961Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected int CalculateDamage(Character target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int baseDamage = Strength * 2 + Weapon.DamageRating;Di2015NewLine    int armorReduction = target.Armor.ArmorRating;Di2015NewLine    int physicalDamage = baseDamage - Math.Min(armorReduction, baseDamage);Di2015NewLine    int pierceDamage = (int)(Weapon.PierceDamage / target.Armor.PierceResistance);Di2015NewLine    int elementDamage = (int)(Weapon.ElementDamage /Di2015NewLine        target.Armor.ElementResistance[Weapon.Element]);Di2015NewLine    int netDamage = physicalDamage + pierceDamage + elementDamage;Di2015NewLine    if (HP < (MaxHP * 0.1))Di2015NewLine        netDamage *= DesperationMultiplier;Di2015NewLine    if (Status.Berserk)Di2015NewLine        netDamage *= BerserkMultiplier;Di2015NewLine    if (Status.Weakened)Di2015NewLine        netDamage *= WeakenedMultiplier;Di2015NewLine    int randomDamage = Random.Next(netDamage / 2);Di2015NewLine    return netDamage + randomDamage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2146130Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Bitmap backgroundBitmap;Di2015NewLineprivate Graphics backgroundGraphics;Di2015NewLineprivate Rectangle rect;Di2015NewLineprivate Rectangle srcRect;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create background bitmap the same size as your screenDi2015NewLinebackgroundBitmap = new Bitmap(this.Width, this.Height);Di2015NewLine// create background bufferDi2015NewLinebackgroundGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(backgroundBitmap);Di2015NewLine// get current screen graphicsDi2015NewLineg = this.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinerect = new Rectangle(0, 0, this.ClientRectangle.Width, this.ClientRectangle.Height);Di2015NewLinesrcRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineThen when you receive your event and need to update the screen, call your own method:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRender();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Render()Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        // draw your image onto the background bufferDi2015NewLine        backgroundGraphics.DrawImage(bmp, rect, srcRect, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine        // draw whatever you need to on the background graphicsDi2015NewLine    backgroundGraphics.DrawImage(.....)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // after all images are drawn onto the background surfaceDi2015NewLine        // blit back buffer to on the screen in one goDi2015NewLine        g.DrawImage(backgroundBitmap, this.ClientRectangle,Di2015NewLine            new Rectangle(0, 0, this.ClientRectangle.Width, this.ClientRectangle.Height), GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
