2160059Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T FindAndCreate<T>(bool localOnly, bool exportedOnly)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type[] types = FindAssignableClasses(typeof(T), localOnly, exportedOnly, false);Di2015NewLine        if (types.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (types.Length != 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Log.Warn(typeof(ReflectionUtil),Di2015NewLine                     "FindAndCreate found {0} instances of {1} whereas only 1 was expected.  Using {2}.  {3}",Di2015NewLine                     types.Length,Di2015NewLine                     typeof(T).FullName,Di2015NewLine                     types[0].FullName,Di2015NewLine                     String.Join("\\r\\n  ", Array.ConvertAll<Type, String>(types, GetFullName)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (T)Activator.CreateInstance(types[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw ExceptionUtil.Rethrow(ex,Di2015NewLine                                        "Unable to create instance of {0} found for interface {1}.",Di2015NewLine                                        types[0].FullName,Di2015NewLine                                        typeof(T).FullName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type[] FindAssignableClasses(Type assignable, bool localOnly, bool exportedOnly, bool loadDll)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine        string localDirectoryName = Path.GetDirectoryName(typeof(ReflectionUtil).Assembly.CodeBase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (loadDll && !_loadedAllDlls)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string dllPath in Directory.GetFiles(localDirectoryName.Substring(6), "*.dll"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Assembly.LoadFrom(dllPath);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catchDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // ignoreDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _loadedAllDlls = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Assembly asm in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (localOnly && Path.GetDirectoryName(asm.CodeBase) != localDirectoryName)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Type[] typesInAssembly;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    typesInAssembly = exportedOnly ? asm.GetExportedTypes() : asm.GetTypes();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catchDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (Type t in typesInAssembly)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (assignable.IsAssignableFrom(t) && assignable != t)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            list.Add(t);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Log.Debug(Di2015NewLine                            typeof(ReflectionUtil),Di2015NewLine                            String.Format(Di2015NewLine                                "Error searching for types assignable to type {0} searching assembly {1} testing {2}{3}",Di2015NewLine                                assignable.FullName,Di2015NewLine                                asm.FullName,Di2015NewLine                                t.FullName,Di2015NewLine                                FlattenReflectionTypeLoadException(ex)),Di2015NewLine                            ex);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // ignore dynamic module error, no way to check for this condition firstDi2015NewLine                // http://groups.google.com/group/microsoft.public.dotnet.languages.csharp/browse_thread/thread/7b02223aefc6afba/c8f5bd05cc8b24b0Di2015NewLine                if (!(ex is NotSupportedException && ex.Message.Contains("not supported in a dynamic")))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Log.Debug(Di2015NewLine                        typeof(ReflectionUtil),Di2015NewLine                        String.Format(Di2015NewLine                            "Error searching for types assignable to type {0} searching assembly {1} from {2}{3}",Di2015NewLine                            assignable.FullName,Di2015NewLine                            asm.FullName,Di2015NewLine                            asm.CodeBase,Di2015NewLine                            FlattenReflectionTypeLoadException(ex)),Di2015NewLine                        ex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return list.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2160269Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Schema;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Testing.XmlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // read the schemaDi2015NewLine            XmlSchema schema;Di2015NewLine            using (var reader = new StreamReader(@"c:\\path\\to\\schema.xsd"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                schema = XmlSchema.Read(reader, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // compile so that post-compilation information is availableDi2015NewLine            XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet();Di2015NewLine            schemaSet.Add(schema);Di2015NewLine            schemaSet.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // update schema referenceDi2015NewLine            schema = schemaSet.Schemas().Cast<XmlSchema>().First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var simpleTypes = schema.SchemaTypes.Values.OfType<XmlSchemaSimpleType>()Di2015NewLine                                               .Where(t => t.Content is XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var simpleType in simpleTypes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var restriction = (XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction) simpleType.Content;Di2015NewLine 2163854Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// method to rotate an image either clockwise or counter-clockwiseDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="img">the image to be rotated</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="rotationAngle">the angle (in degrees).Di2015NewLine/// NOTE: Di2015NewLine/// Positive values will rotate clockwiseDi2015NewLine/// negative values will rotate counter-clockwiseDi2015NewLine/// </param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static Image RotateImage(Image img, float rotationAngle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //create an empty Bitmap imageDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(img.Width, img.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //turn the Bitmap into a Graphics objectDi2015NewLine    Graphics gfx = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //now we set the rotation point to the center of our imageDi2015NewLine    gfx.TranslateTransform((float)bmp.Width / 2, (float)bmp.Height / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //now rotate the imageDi2015NewLine    gfx.RotateTransform(rotationAngle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    gfx.TranslateTransform(-(float)bmp.Width / 2, -(float)bmp.Height / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //set the InterpolationMode to HighQualityBicubic so to ensure a highDi2015NewLine    //quality image once it is transformed to the specified sizeDi2015NewLine    gfx.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //now draw our new image onto the graphics objectDi2015NewLine    gfx.DrawImage(img, new Point(0, 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //dispose of our Graphics objectDi2015NewLine    gfx.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //return the imageDi2015NewLine    return bmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2166877Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void PopulateTree(IEnumerable<MyObject> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var groupedItems =Di2015NewLine        from i in itemsDi2015NewLine        group i by i.Parent into gDi2015NewLine        select new { Name = g.Key, Children = g.Select(c => c.Child) };Di2015NewLine    var lookup = groupedItems.ToDictionary(i => i.Name, i => i.Children);Di2015NewLine    foreach (string parent in lookup.Keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (lookup.ContainsKey(parent))Di2015NewLine            AddToTree(lookup, Enumerable.Empty<string>(), parent);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void AddToTree(Dictionary<string, IEnumerable<string>> lookup,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<string> path, string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<string> children;Di2015NewLine    if (lookup.TryGetValue(name, out children))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<string> newPath = path.Concat(new string[] { name });Di2015NewLine        foreach (string child in children)Di2015NewLine            AddToTree(lookup, newPath, child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode parentNode = null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string item in path)Di2015NewLine            parentNode = AddTreeNode(parentNode, item);Di2015NewLine        AddTreeNode(parentNode, name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate TreeNode AddTreeNode(TreeNode parent, string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TreeNode node = new TreeNode(name);Di2015NewLine    if (parent != null)Di2015NewLine        parent.Nodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        treeView1.Nodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine    return node;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2174787Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string SendRequest(string url, string postdata)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(postdata))Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest rqst = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine    // No proxy details are required in the code.Di2015NewLine    rqst.Proxy = GlobalProxySelection.GetEmptyWebProxy();Di2015NewLine    rqst.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    rqst.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    // In order to solve the problem with the proxy not recognising the userDi2015NewLine    // agent, a default value is provided here.Di2015NewLine    rqst.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1)";Di2015NewLine    byte[] byteData = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postdata);Di2015NewLine    rqst.ContentLength = byteData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (Stream postStream = rqst.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        postStream.Write(byteData, 0, byteData.Length);Di2015NewLine        postStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    StreamReader rsps = new StreamReader(rqst.GetResponse().GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine    string strRsps = rsps.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    return strRsps;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2175001Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct Tribool : IEquatable<Tribool> {Di2015NewLine    public static Tribool True { get { return new Tribool(true); } }Di2015NewLine    public static Tribool False { get { return new Tribool(false); } }Di2015NewLine    public static Tribool Unknown { get { return new Tribool(); } }Di2015NewLine    enum TriboolState { Unknown = 0, True = 1, False = 2 }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TriboolState state;Di2015NewLine    public Tribool(bool state) {Di2015NewLine        this.state = state ? TriboolState.True : TriboolState.False;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // default struct ctor handles unknownDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator true(Tribool value) {Di2015NewLine        return value.state == TriboolState.True;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator false(Tribool value) {Di2015NewLine        return value.state == TriboolState.False;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(Tribool x, Tribool y) {Di2015NewLine        return x.state == y.state;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator !=(Tribool x, Tribool y) {Di2015NewLine        return x.state != y.state; // note: which "unknown" logic do you want?Di2015NewLine                                   // i.e. does unknown == unknown?Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        return state.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj) {Di2015NewLine        return (obj != null && obj is Tribool) ? Equals((Tribool)obj) : false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Tribool value) {Di2015NewLine        return value == this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode() {Di2015NewLine        return state.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Tribool(bool value) {Di2015NewLine        return new Tribool(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static explicit operator bool(Tribool value) {Di2015NewLine        switch (value.state) {Di2015NewLine            case TriboolState.True: return true;Di2015NewLine            case TriboolState.False: return false;Di2015NewLine            default: throw new InvalidCastException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2178675Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum AssemblyType Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    CompactFramework, Di2015NewLine    Silverlight,Di2015NewLine    FullFramework, Di2015NewLine    NativeBinary Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic AssemblyType GetAssemblyType(string pathToAssembly) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Assembly asm = Assembly.LoadFrom(pathToAssembly); Di2015NewLine        var mscorlib = asm.GetReferencedAssemblies().FirstOrDefault(a => string.Compare(a.Name, "mscorlib", true) == 0); Di2015NewLine        ulong token = BitConverter.ToUInt64(mscorlib.GetPublicKeyToken(), 0); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (token) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            case 0xac22333d05b89d96: Di2015NewLine                return AssemblyType.CompactFramework; Di2015NewLine            case 0x89e03419565c7ab7: Di2015NewLine                return AssemblyType.FullFramework; Di2015NewLine            case 0x8e79a7bed785ec7c:Di2015NewLine                return AssemblyType.Silverlight;Di2015NewLine            default: Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException(); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    catch (BadImageFormatException) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        return AssemblyType.NativeBinary; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2179024Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void StreamFile(string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string fileName = Path.GetFileName(filePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var fStream = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var contentLength = fStream.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Request.UserAgent.Contains("MSIE"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Response.AddHeader("Content-Transfer-Encoding", "binary");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Response.ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine        Response.AddHeader("Content-Length", contentLength.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Even though "Content-Disposition" should have an upper-case "d", as per http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2183.txtDi2015NewLine        // IE fails to recognize this if the "d" is upper-cased.Di2015NewLine        Response.AddHeader("Content-disposition", "attachment; filename=" + fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[8192];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (Response.IsClientConnected)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var count = fStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            if (count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Response.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine            Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Response.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2181611Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AsyncQueueManager : IDisposable {Di2015NewLine    private readonly ManualResetEvent waitHandle = new ManualResetEvent(true);Di2015NewLine    private int count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AsyncQueueManager Queue(Action<object> action) {Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Increment(ref count);Di2015NewLine        waitHandle.Reset();Di2015NewLine        Action<object> actionWrapper = CreateActionWrapper(action);Di2015NewLine        WaitCallback waitCallback = new WaitCallback(actionWrapper);Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(waitCallback);Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Action<object> CreateActionWrapper(Action<object> action) {Di2015NewLine        Action<object> actionWrapper = (object state) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                action(state);Di2015NewLine            } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine                // logDi2015NewLine            } finally {Di2015NewLine                if (Interlocked.Decrement(ref count) == 0) {Di2015NewLine                    waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        return actionWrapper;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Wait() {Di2015NewLine        waitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Wait(TimeSpan timeout) {Di2015NewLine        waitHandle.WaitOne(timeout);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose() {Di2015NewLine        waitHandle.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2183442Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static unsafe string StripTabsAndNewlines(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int len = s.Length;Di2015NewLine        char* newChars = stackalloc char[len];Di2015NewLine        char* currentChar = newChars;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = s[i];Di2015NewLine            switch (c)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case '\\r':Di2015NewLine                case '\\n':Di2015NewLine                case '\\t':Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    *currentChar++ = c;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new string(newChars, 0, (int)(currentChar - newChars));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        public Func<object, bool> Func { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public WorkerState(Func<object, bool> func, object input, int id) {Di2015NewLine            Func = func;Di2015NewLine            Input = input;Di2015NewLine            ID = id;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AutoResetEvent[] events;Di2015NewLine    bool[] statuses;Di2015NewLine    bool _workComplete;Di2015NewLine    int _number;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TrackedWorkers(int number) {Di2015NewLine        if (number <= 0 || number > 64) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(Di2015NewLine                "number",Di2015NewLine                "number must be positive and at most 64"Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this._number = number;Di2015NewLine        events = new AutoResetEvent[number];Di2015NewLine        statuses = new bool[number];Di2015NewLine        _workComplete = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Initialize() {Di2015NewLine        _workComplete = false;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _number; i++) {Di2015NewLine            events[i] = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            statuses[i] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void DoWork(object state) {Di2015NewLine        WorkerState ws = (WorkerState)state;Di2015NewLine        statuses[ws.ID] = ws.Func(ws.Input);Di2015NewLine        events[ws.ID].Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void LaunchWorkers(Func<object, bool> func, object[] inputs) {Di2015NewLine        Initialize();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _number; i++) {Di2015NewLine            WorkerState ws = new WorkerState(func, inputs[i], i);Di2015NewLine            ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(this.DoWork, ws);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        WaitHandle.WaitAll(events);Di2015NewLine        _workComplete = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void ThrowIfWorkIsNotDone() {Di2015NewLine        if (!_workComplete) {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("work not complete");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool GetWorkerStatus(int i) {Di2015NewLine        ThrowIfWorkIsNotDone();Di2015NewLine        return statuses[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<int> SuccessfulWorkers {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return WorkersWhere(b => b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<int> FailedWorkers {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return WorkersWhere(b => !b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<int> WorkersWhere(Predicate<bool> predicate) {Di2015NewLine        ThrowIfWorkIsNotDone();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _number; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(statuses[i])) {Di2015NewLine                yield return i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2185841Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static Random rg = new Random();Di2015NewLine    static object lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        int count = 64;Di2015NewLine        Pair[] pairs = new Pair[count];Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < count; i++) {Di2015NewLine            pairs[i] = new Pair(i, 2 * i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        TrackedWorkers workers = new TrackedWorkers(count);Di2015NewLine        workers.LaunchWorkers(SleepAndAdd, pairs.Cast<object>().ToArray());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Number successful: {0}",Di2015NewLine            workers.SuccessfulWorkers.Count()Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Number failed: {0}",Di2015NewLine            workers.FailedWorkers.Count()Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static bool SleepAndAdd(object o) {Di2015NewLine        Pair pair = (Pair)o;Di2015NewLine        int timeout;Di2015NewLine        double d;Di2015NewLine        lock (lockObject) {Di2015NewLine            timeout = rg.Next(1000);Di2015NewLine            d = rg.NextDouble();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(timeout);Di2015NewLine        bool success = d < 0.5;Di2015NewLine        if (success) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(pair.First + pair.Second);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (success);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

MoveNext()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_findHandle == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _findHandle = new SafeFileHandle(FindFirstFile(_fileName, out _win32FindData), true);Di2015NewLine            if (_findHandle.IsInvalid)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int lastError = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine                if (lastError == ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND)Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                throw new Win32Exception(lastError);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine Win32Exception(lastError);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Reset()Di2015NewLine 2187032Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int DaysInPeriod = 14;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<DateTime> GetPayPeriodsInRange(DateTime start, DateTime end, bool isOdd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var epoch = isOdd ? new DateTime(2009, 11, 1) : new DateTime(2009, 4, 1);Di2015NewLine    var periodsTilStart = Math.Floor(((start - epoch).TotalDays) / DaysInPeriod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var next = epoch.AddDays(periodsTilStart * DaysInPeriod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (next < start) next = next.AddDays(DaysInPeriod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (next <= end)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return next;Di2015NewLine        next = next.AddDays(DaysInPeriod);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic DateTime GetPayPeriodStartDate(DateTime givenDate, bool isOdd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var candidatePeriods = GetPayPeriodsInRange(givenDate.AddDays(-DaysInPeriod), givenDate.AddDays(DaysInPeriod), isOdd);Di2015NewLine    var period = from p in candidatePeriods where (p <= givenDate) && (givenDate < p.AddDays(DaysInPeriod)) select p;Di2015NewLine    return period.First();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2187414Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass LockManager<TKey>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<TKey, List<EventWaitHandle>> locks =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<TKey, List<EventWaitHandle>>();Di2015NewLine    private Object syncRoot = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Lock(TKey key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Enter(syncRoot);Di2015NewLine            List<EventWaitHandle> waiters = null;Di2015NewLine            if (true == locks.TryGetValue(key, out waiters))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Key is locked, add ourself to waiting listDi2015NewLine                // Not that this code is not safe under OOM conditionsDi2015NewLine                AutoResetEvent eventLockFree = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine                waiters.Add(eventLockFree);Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(syncRoot);Di2015NewLine                // Now wait for a notificationDi2015NewLine                eventLockFree.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // event is freeDi2015NewLine                waiters = new List<EventWaitHandle>();Di2015NewLine                locks.Add(key, waiters);Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(syncRoot);Di2015NewLine                // we're doneDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Release(TKey key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<EventWaitHandle> waiters = null;Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (false == locks.TryGetValue(key, out waiters))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(false, "Releasing a bad lock!");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            locks.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Notify ALL waiters. Unfair notificationsDi2015NewLine        // are better than FIFO for reasons of lock convoysDi2015NewLine        foreach (EventWaitHandle waitHandle in waiters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2187414Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ThreadDataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public LockManager<int> LockManager { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int[] Work { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public AutoResetEvent Done { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] forA = new int[] {5, 8, 9, 12};Di2015NewLine        int[] forB = new int[] {7, 8, 9, 13, 14 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        LockManager<int> lockManager = new LockManager<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ThreadData tdA = new ThreadDataDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LockManager = lockManager,Di2015NewLine            Work = forA,Di2015NewLine            Done = new AutoResetEvent(false),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        ThreadData tdB = new ThreadDataDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LockManager = lockManager,Di2015NewLine            Work = forB,Di2015NewLine            Done = new AutoResetEvent(false),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(new WaitCallback(Worker), tdA);Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(new WaitCallback(Worker), tdB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WaitHandle.WaitAll(new WaitHandle[] { tdA.Done, tdB.Done });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Worker(object args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(args is ThreadData);Di2015NewLine        ThreadData data = (ThreadData) args;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (int key in data.Work)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data.LockManager.Lock(key);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("~{0}: {1}",Di2015NewLine                    Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, key);Di2015NewLine                // simulate the load the set for KeyDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            foreach (int key in data.Work)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Now free they locked keysDi2015NewLine                data.LockManager.Release(key);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Write(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data.Done.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
